Then [he]60-waldo called [his]60-waldo young birds together , and put [his]60-waldo book under [his]60-waldo arm , and walked [home]302-home along the stone wall . There was a rare beauty to [him]60-waldo in the sunshine that evening .

END OF VOL . I.

CHAPTER III . [GREGORY ROSE]156-gregory FINDS [HIS]156-gregory AFFINITY .

[THE new man]4108-the new man , [Gregory Rose]156-gregory , sat at the door of [[his]4108-the new man dwelling]1918-his dwelling , [his]4108-the new man arms folded , [his]4108-the new man legs crossed , and a profound melancholy seeming to rest over [his]4108-the new man soul . [[His]4108-the new man house]4109-his house was [a little square daub - and - wattle building]1920-a little square daub - and - wattle building , far out in the " karroo , "[4108-the new man] two miles from [the homestead]201-the homestead . [It]4109-his house was covered outside with a sombre coating of brown mud , two little panes being let into the walls for windows . Behind [it]4109-his house were the " sheep - kraals , "[4108-the new man] and to the right a large dam , now principally

containing baked mud . Far off the little " kopje "[1936-noble blood] concealed [the homestead]201-the homestead , and was not itself an object conspicuous enough to relieve the dreary monotony of [the landscape]1923-the landscape .

Before the door sat [Gregory Rose]156-gregory in [his]4108-the new man shirt - sleeves , on a camp - stool , and ever and anon [he]4108-the new man sighed deeply . There was that in [his]4108-the new man countenance for which even [his]4108-the new man depressing circumstances failed to account . Again and again [he]4108-the new man looked at the little " kopje , "[1936-noble blood] at the milk - pail at [his]4108-the new man side , and at the brown pony , who a short way off cropped the dry bushes and sighed .

Presently [he]4108-the new man rose and went into [[his]4108-the new man house]4109-his house . It was [one tiny room]1925-one tiny room , the whitewashed walls profusely covered with prints cut from the " Illustrated London Newsí , and in which there was a noticeable preponderance of female faces and figures . A stretcher filled one end of [the hut]4226-the hut , and a rack for a gun and a little hanging looking - glass diversified the gable opposite , while[156-gregory]

in the centre stood a chair and table . All was scrupulously neat and clean , for [Gregory]156-gregory kept a little duster folded in the corner of [his]4108-the new man table - drawer , just as [he]4108-the new man had seen [[his]4108-the new man mother]439-his mother do , and every morning before [he]4108-the new man went out [he]4108-the new man said [his]4108-the new man prayers , and made [his]4108-the new man bed , and dusted the table and the legs of the chairs , and even the pictures on the wall and the gun - rack .

On this hot afternoon [he]4108-the new man took from beneath [his]4108-the new man pillow a watch - bag , made by [[his]4108-the new man sister]1927-his sister [Jemima]157-jemima , and took out the watch . Only half - past four ! With a suppressed groan [he]4108-the new man dropped it back and sat down beside the table . Half - past four ! Presently [he]4108-the new man roused [himself]4108-the new man . [He]4108-the new man would write to [[his]4108-the new man sister]1927-his sister [Jemima]157-jemima . [He]4108-the new man always wrote to [her]157-jemima when [he]4108-the new man was miserable . [She]157-jemima was [his]4108-the new man safety - valve . [He]4108-the new man forgot [her]157-jemima when [he]4108-the new man was happy ; but [he]4108-the new man used [her]157-jemima when [he]4108-the new man was wretched .

[He]4108-the new man took out ink and paper ; there was a family crest and motto on the latter , for [the

Roses]158-the roses since coming to [the colony]4059-the colony had discovered that [they]158-the roses were of distinguished lineage . [Old Rose]159-old rose [himself]159-old rose , [an honest English farmer]1930-an honest english farmer , knew nothing of [his]159-old rose noble descent ; but [[his]159-old rose wife]3738-his wife and [daughter]1932-daughter knew especially [[his]159-old rose daughter]1933-his daughter . There were Roses in [England]15-england who kept [a park]1934-a park and dated from the Conquest . So [the colonial " Rose Farm]4227-the colonial " rose farm "[156-gregory] became " [Rose Manor]36-rose manor "[156-gregory] in remembrance of [the ancestral domain]1935-the ancestral domain , and the claim of [the Roses]158-the roses to [noble blood]1936-noble blood was established in [their]158-the roses own minds at least .

[Gregory]156-gregory took up one of the white , crested sheets ; but on deeper reflection [he]156-gregory determined to take a pink one , as more suitable to the state of [his]156-gregory feelings . [He]156-gregory began " [Kopje]160-kopje Alone , "[156-gregory] Monday afternoon . " [[MY]156-gregory DEAR]3426-my dear [JEMINA]161-jemina "[156-gregory]

Then [he]156-gregory looked up into the little glass opposite . It was a youthful face reflected there ,

with curling brown beard and hair ; but in the dark blue eyes there was a look of languid longing that touched [him]156-gregory . [He]156-gregory re - dipped [his]156-gregory pen and wrote ,

" When [I]156-gregory look up into the little glass that hangs opposite [me]156-gregory , [I]156-gregory wonder if that changed and sad face "[156-gregory] Here [he]156-gregory sat still and reflected . It sounded almost as if [he]156-gregory might be conceited or unmanly to be looking at [his]156-gregory own face in the glass . No , that would not do . So [he]156-gregory looked for another pink sheet and began again .

" Kopje Alone , "[156-gregory] Monday afternoon .

" [DEAR SISTER]4229-dear sister ,[157-jemima]

" IT is hardly six months since [I]157-jemima left [you]4229-dear sister to come to [this spot]4230-this spot , yet could [you]4229-dear sister now see [me]157-jemima [I]157-jemima know what [you]4229-dear sister would say , [I]157-jemima know what [mother]4231-mother would say "[157-jemima] Can that be [our]1937-our Greg that thing with the strange look in [his]156-gregory eyes?í

" Yes , [Jemima]157-jemima , it is [[your]4229-dear sister Greg]4232-your greg , and the[157-jemima]

change has been coming over [me]0-i ever since [I]0-i came [here]3430-here ; but it is greatest since yesterday . [You]1939-you know what sorrows [I]0-i have passed through , [Jemima]157-jemima ; how unjustly [I]0-i was always treated at [school]3436-school , [the masters]1941-the masters keeping [me]0-i back and calling [me]0-i [a blockhead]1942-a blockhead , though , as [they]1941-the masters [themselves]1941-the masters allowed , [I]0-i had the best memory of [any boy in [the school]1944-the school]1943-any boy in the school , and could repeat whole books from beginning to end . [You]1939-you know how cruelly [father]778-father always used [me]0-i , calling [me]0-i a noodle and a milksop , just because [he]778-father could n't understand [my]0-i fine nature . [You]1939-you know how [he]778-father has made [a farmer]1946-a farmer of [me]0-i instead of [a minister]1947-a minister , as [I]0-i ought to have been ; [you]1939-you know it all , [Jemima]157-jemima ; and how [I]0-i have borne it all , not as [a woman , who whines for every touch]1948-a woman , who whines for every touch , but as [a man]242-a man should in silence .

" But there are things , there is a thing , which the soul longs to pour forth into a kindred ear .[157-jemima]

" [Dear sister]4229-dear sister , have [you]4229-dear sister ever known what it is to keep wanting and wanting and wanting to kiss [some one]3445-some one 's mouth , and [you]4229-dear sister may not ; to touch [some one]3445-some one 's hand , and [you]4229-dear sister can not ? [I]1951-i am in love , [Jemima]157-jemima ![1951-i]

" [The old Dutch - woman from whom [I]1951-i hire [this[1951-i]

place]464-this place]4236-the old dutch - woman from whom i hire this place has [a little step - daughter]1950-a little step - daughter , and [her]1950-a little step - daughter name begins with E .

" [She]1950-a little step - daughter is English . [I]1951-i do not know how [[her]1950-a little step - daughter father]3969-her father came to marry [a Boer - woman]4239-a boer - woman . It makes [me]1951-i feel so strange to put down that letter , that [I]1951-i can hardly go on writing E . [I]1951-i 've loved [her]1950-a little step - daughter ever since [I]1951-i came [here]3430-here . For weeks [I]1951-i have not been able to eat or drink ; [my]1951-i very tobacco when [I]1951-i smoke has no taste ; and [I]1951-i can remain for no more than five minutes in [one place]4241-one place , and sometimes feel as though [I]1951-i were really going mad .[1951-i]

" Every evening [I]1951-i go [there]317-there to fetch [my]1951-i milk . Yesterday [she]1950-a little step - daughter gave [me]1951-i some coffee . The spoon fell on the ground . [She]1950-a little step - daughter picked it up ; when [she]1950-a little step - daughter gave it [me]1951-i [her]1950-a little step - daughter finger touched mine . [Jemima]157-jemima , [I]1951-i do not know if [I]1951-i fancied it [I]1951-i shivered hot , and [she]1950-a little step - daughter shivered too ! [I]1951-i thought , "[1951-i] It is all right ; [she]1951-i will be [mine]1952-mine ; [she]1951-i loves me!í Just then , [Jemima]157-jemima , in came [a fellow]1953-a fellow , [a great , coarse fellow]1954-a great , coarse fellow , [a German a ridiculous fellow , with curls right down to [his]1953-a fellow shoulders]1955-a german a ridiculous fellow , with curls right down to his shoulders ; it makes one sick to look at [him]1953-a fellow . [He]1953-a fellow 's only [a servant of the Boer - woman]1956-a servant of the boer - woman 's , and [a low , vulgar , uneducated

thing]1957-a low , vulgar , uneducated thing , that 's never been to [boarding - school]1958-boarding - school in [his]1953-a fellow life . [He]1953-a fellow had been to [the next farm]3819-the next farm seeking sheep . When [he]1953-a fellow came in [she]1951-i said , " Good evening , [Waldo]60-waldo . Have some coffee!í and [she]1951-i kissed [him]60-waldo .[1951-i]

" All last night [I]1951-i heard nothing else but "[1951-i] Have some coffee ; have some coffee.í If [I]0-i went to sleep for a moment [I]0-i dreamed that [her]1951-i finger was pressing [mine]0-i ; but when [I]0-i woke with a start [I]0-i heard [her]1951-i say , " Good evening , [Waldo]60-waldo . Have some coffee!í "[1960-they] Is this madness ? " [I]1961-not angels have not eaten a mouthful to - day . This evening [I]1961-not angels go and propose to [her]1951-i . If [she]1951-i refuses [me]1961-not angels [I]1961-not angels shall go and kill [myself]1961-not angels to - morrow . There is a dam of water close by . [The sheep]298-the sheep have drunk most of it up , but there is still enough if [I]1961-not angels tie a stone to [my]1961-not angels neck .[1961-not angels]

" It is a choice between death and madness . [I]1961-not angels can endure no more . If this should be the last letter [you]4244-you ever get from [me]1961-not angels , think of [me]1961-not angels tenderly , and forgive [me]1961-not angels . Without [her]1951-i life would be a howling wilderness , a long tribulation . [She]1951-i is [my]1961-not angels affinity ; the one love of[1961-not angels]

[my]0-i life , of [my]0-i youth , of [my]0-i manhood ; [my]0-i sunshine ; [my]0-i God - given blossom .

" "[1960-they] [They]1960-they never loved who dreamed that [they]1960-they loved once , And who saith , " [I]1961-not angels loved once "[1961-not angels] ? [Not angels]1961-not angels , whose deep eyes look down through realms of light!í

" [[Your]4244-you disconsolate brother]4245-your disconsolate brother , on what is , in all probability , the last and distracted night of [his]4245-your disconsolate brother life .[1961-not angels]

" [Gregory Nazianzen]156-gregory Rose .[156-gregory]

" P.S. Tell [mother]4231-mother to take care of [my]156-gregory pearl studs . [I]156-gregory left them in the wash - hand - stand drawer . Do n't let [the children]358-the children get hold of them . "[156-gregory] P.P.S. [I]0-i shall take this letter with [me]0-i to [the farm]260-the farm . If [I]0-i turn down one corner [you]1963-you may know [I]0-i have been accepted ; if not , [you]1963-you may know it is all up with [[your]1963-you heart - broken brother]1964-your heart - broken brother .

" G.N.R. "[54-em]

[Gregory]156-gregory , having finished this letter , read it over with much approval , put it in an envelope ,

addressed it , and sat contemplating the ink - pot , somewhat relieved in mind .

The evening turned out chilly and very windy after the day 's heat . From afar off , as [Gregory]156-gregory neared [the homestead]201-the homestead on [the brown pony]1966-the brown pony , [he]156-gregory could distinguish a little figure in a little red cloak at the door of [the cow - kraal]1967-the cow - kraal . [Em]54-em leaned over the poles that barred the gate , and watched the frothing milk run through the black fingers of [the herdsman]1968-the herdsman , while the unwilling cows stood with tethered heads by the milking poles . [She]54-em had thrown the red cloak over [her]54-em own head , and held it under [her]54-em chin with a little hand , to keep from [her]54-em ears the wind , that playfully shook it , and tossed the little fringe of yellow hair into [her]54-em eyes . " Is it not too cold for [you]54-em to be standing here ? "[156-gregory] said [Gregory]156-gregory , coming softly close to [her]54-em .

" Oh , no ; it is so nice . [I]54-em always come to watch the milking . That red cow with the[54-em]

short horns is bringing up the calf of the white cow that died . [She]54-em loves [it]1969-it so just as if it were [her]54-em own . It is so nice to see [her]54-em lick [its]1969-it little ears . Just look ! "[156-gregory]

" The clouds are black . [I]156-gregory think it is going to rain to - night , "[156-gregory] said [Gregory]156-gregory . " Yes , "[54-em] answered [Em]54-em , looking up as well as [she]54-em could for the little yellow fringe . " But [I]156-gregory 'm sure [you]54-em must be cold , "[156-gregory] said [Gregory]156-gregory , and put [his]156-gregory hand under the cloak , and found there a small fist doubled up , soft , and very warm . [He]156-gregory held it fast in [his]156-gregory hand .

" Oh , [Em]54-em , [I]54-em love [you]54-em better than [all the world]4248-all the world besides ! Tell [me]54-em , do [you]54-em love [me]54-em a little ? "[54-em]

" Yes , [I]54-em do , "[54-em] said [Em]54-em , hesitating , and trying softly to free [her]54-em hand . " Better than everything ; better than all [the world]252-the world , [darling]4250-darling ? "[156-gregory] [he]156-gregory asked , bending down so low that the yellow hair was blown into [his]156-gregory eyes .

" [I]1968-the herdsman do n't know , "[1968-the herdsman] said [Em]54-em , gravely . " [I]1972-you do love [you]156-gregory very much ; but [I]1972-you love [[my]1972-you cousin]4251-my cousin who is at [school]3436-school , and [Waldo]60-waldo , very much . [You]156-gregory see [I]1972-you have known [them]4253-them so long ! "[1972-you] " Oh , [Em]54-em , do not talk to [me]1973-her so coldly ! "[1973-her] [Gregory]156-gregory cried , seizing the little arm that rested on the gate , and pressing it till [she]54-em was half afraid . [The herdsman]1968-the herdsman had moved away to the other end of [the " kraal "]4254-the " kraal "[1973-her] now , and the cows , busy with [their]1968-the herdsman calves , took no notice of [the little human farce]1971-the little human farce . " [Em]54-em , if [you]54-em talk so to [me]156-gregory [I]156-gregory will go mad ! [You]54-em must love [me]156-gregory , love [me]156-gregory better than all ! [You]54-em must give [yourself]54-em to [me]156-gregory . [I]156-gregory have loved [you]54-em since that first moment when [I]156-gregory saw [you]54-em walking by the stone wall with the jug in [your]54-em hands . [You]54-em were made for [me]156-gregory , created for [me]156-gregory ! [I]156-gregory will love [you]54-em till [I]156-gregory die ! Oh , [Em]54-em , do not be so cold , so cruel to [me]156-gregory ! "[156-gregory]

[He]1972-you held [her]1973-her arm so tightly that [her]1973-her fingers relaxed their hold , and the cloak fluttered down

on to the ground , and the wind played more roughly than ever with the little yellow head .

" [I]156-gregory do love [you]1972-you very much , "[156-gregory] [she]1973-her said ; " but [I]156-gregory do not know if [I]156-gregory want to marry [you]1972-you . [I]156-gregory love [you]1972-you better than [Waldo]60-waldo , but [I]156-gregory ca n't tell if [I]156-gregory love [you]1972-you better than [Lyndall]59-lyndall . If [you]1972-you would let [me]156-gregory wait for a week , [I]156-gregory think perhaps [I]156-gregory could tell [you]1972-you . "[156-gregory] [Gregory]156-gregory picked up the cloak and wrapped it round [her]1973-her .

" If [you]1973-her could but love [me]54-em as [I]54-em love [you]1973-her , "[54-em] [he]156-gregory said ; " but [no woman]4255-no woman can love as [a man]242-a man can . [I]54-em will wait till Saturday . [I]54-em will not once come near [you]1973-her till then . Good - bye ! Oh , [Em]54-em , "[54-em] [he]156-gregory said , turning again , and twining [his]156-gregory arm about [her]1973-her , and kissing [her]1973-her surprised little mouth , " if [you]54-em are not [[my]156-gregory wife]3448-my wife [I]156-gregory can not live . [I]156-gregory have never loved [another woman]4258-another woman , and [I]156-gregory never shall ! never , never ! "[156-gregory]

" [You]156-gregory make [me]1975-the yellow - haired little woman afraid , "[1975-the yellow - haired little woman] said [Em]54-em . " Come , let [us]4259-us go , and [I]324-one will fill [your]156-gregory pail . "[324-one]

" [I]156-gregory want no milk . Good - bye ! [You]54-em will not see [me]156-gregory again till Saturday . "[156-gregory] Late that night , when [every one else]1443-every one else had gone to bed , [the yellow - haired little woman]1975-the yellow - haired little woman stood alone in [the kitchen]798-the kitchen . [She]1975-the yellow - haired little woman had come to fill the kettle for the next morning 's coffee , and now stood before the fire . The warm reflection lit the grave old - womanish little face , that was so unusually thoughtful this evening .

" Better than all [the world]252-the world ; better than everything ; [he]137-one loves [me]1975-the yellow - haired little woman better than everything ! "[1975-the yellow - haired little woman] [She]1975-the yellow - haired little woman said the words aloud , as if they were more easy to believe if [she]1975-the yellow - haired little woman spoke them so . [She]1975-the yellow - haired little woman had given out so much love in [her]1975-the yellow - haired little woman little life , and had got none of it back with interest . Now [one]324-one said , " [I]156-gregory love [you]1975-the yellow - haired little woman better than all [the world]252-the world . "[156-gregory] [One]137-one loved [her]1975-the yellow - haired little woman better than [she]1975-the yellow - haired little woman loved [him]137-one . How suddenly rich [she]1975-the yellow - haired little woman was . [She]1975-the yellow - haired little woman kept clasping and unclasping [her]1975-the yellow - haired little woman hands . So [a beggar]1978-a beggar feels who falls asleep on the pavement wet and hungry ,

and who wakes in [a palace - hall]1979-a palace - hall with [servants and lights]1980-servants and lights , and a feast before [him]1978-a beggar . Of course [the beggar]1981-the beggar 's is only a dream , and [he]1978-a beggar wakes from it ; and this was real .

[Gregory]156-gregory had said to [her]1975-the yellow - haired little woman , " [I]156-gregory will love [you]1975-the yellow - haired little woman as long as [I]156-gregory live . "[156-gregory] [She]1975-the yellow - haired little woman said the words over and over to [herself]1975-the yellow - haired little woman like a song . " [I]54-em will send for [him]156-gregory to - morrow , and [I]54-em will tell [him]156-gregory how [I]54-em love [him]156-gregory back , "[54-em] [she]1975-the yellow - haired little woman said . But [Em]54-em needed not to send for [him]156-gregory . [Gregory]156-gregory discovered on reaching [home]302-home that [Jemima]157-jemima 's letter was still in [his]156-gregory pocket . And , therefore , much as [he]156-gregory disliked the appearance of vacillation and weakness , [he]156-gregory was obliged to be at [the farm - house]211-the farm - house before sunrise to post it . " If [I]54-em see [her]157-jemima , "[54-em] [Gregory]156-gregory said , " [I]54-em shall only bow to [her]157-jemima . [She]157-jemima shall see that [I]54-em am [a man]242-a man , one who keeps [his]156-gregory word . "[54-em]

As to [Jemima]157-jemima 's letter , [he]156-gregory had turned down one corner of the page , and then turned it back ,

leav- leaving

ing a deep crease . That would show that [he]156-gregory was neither accepted nor rejected , but that matters were in an intermediate condition . It was a more poetical way then putting it in plain words .

[Gregory]156-gregory was barely in time with [his]156-gregory letter , for [Waldo]60-waldo was starting when [he]60-waldo reached [the homestead]201-the homestead , and [Em]54-em was on the door - step to see [him]60-waldo off . When [he]156-gregory had given the letter , and [Waldo]60-waldo had gone , [Gregory]156-gregory bowed stiffly and prepared to remount [his]156-gregory own pony , but somewhat slowly . It was still early ; [none of [the servants]1986-the servants]1985-none of the servants were about . [Em]54-em came up close to [him]156-gregory and put [her]54-em little hand softly on [his]156-gregory arm as [he]156-gregory stood by [his]156-gregory horse . " [I]54-em do love [you]156-gregory best of all , "[54-em] [she]54-em said . [She]54-em was not frightened now , however much [he]156-gregory kissed [her]54-em . " [I]0-i wish [I]0-i was beautiful and nice , "[0-i] [she]54-em added , looking up into [his]156-gregory eyes as [he]156-gregory held [her]54-em against [his]156-gregory breast .

" [[My]0-i darling]4263-my darling , to [me]0-i [you]54-em are more beautiful[0-i]

than [all the women in [the world]252-the world]1987-all the women in the world ; dearer to [me]0-i than everything it holds . If [you]54-em were in [hell]4026-hell [I]0-i would go after [you]54-em to find [you]54-em there ! If [you]54-em were dead , though [my]0-i body moved , [my]0-i soul would be under the ground with [you]54-em . All life as [I]0-i pass with [you]54-em in [my]0-i arms will be perfect to [me]0-i . It will pass , pass like a ray of sunshine . "[54-em]

[Em]54-em thought how beautiful and grand [his]0-i face was as [she]54-em looked up into it . [She]54-em raised [her]54-em hand gently and put it on [his]0-i forehead . " [You]54-em are so silent , so cold , [[my]54-em [Em]54-em]4264-my em , "[54-em] [he]0-i cried . " Have [you]54-em nothing to say to [me]0-i ? "[0-i] A little shade of wonder filled [her]54-em eyes . " [I]54-em will do everything [you]0-i tell [me]54-em , "[54-em] [she]54-em said . What else could [she]54-em say ? [Her]54-em idea of love was only service .

" Then , [[my]54-em own precious one]4265-my own precious one , promise never to kiss [that fellow]1689-that fellow again . [I]54-em can not bear that [you]1991-you should love [any one]504-any one but [me]54-em . [You]1991-you must not ! [I]54-em will not have it ! If every relation [I]54-em[54-em]

had in [the world]252-the world were to die to - morrow , [I]0-i would be quite happy if [I]0-i still only had [you]1991-you ! [[My]0-i darling]4263-my darling , [[my]0-i love]4051-my love , why are [you]1991-you so cold ? Promise [me]0-i not to love [him]1994-him any more . If [you]1991-you asked [me]0-i to do anything for [you]1991-you , [I]0-i would do it , though it cost [my]0-i life . "[1994-him]

[Em]54-em put [her]54-em hand very gravely round [his]1994-him neck . " [I]54-em will never kiss [him]1994-him , "[54-em] [she]54-em said , " and [I]54-em will try not to love [any one else]4268-any one else . But [I]54-em do not know if [I]54-em will be able . "[54-em]

" Oh , [[my]53-tant ' sannie darling]4263-my darling , [I]53-tant ' sannie think of [you]54-em all night , all day . [I]53-tant ' sannie think of nothing else , love , nothing else , "[53-tant ' sannie] [he]1994-him said , folding [his]1994-him arms about [her]54-em .

[Em]54-em was a little conscience - stricken ; even that morning [she]54-em had found time to remember that in six months [[her]54-em cousin]1312-her cousin would come back from [school]3436-school , and [she]54-em had thought to remind [Waldo]60-waldo of [the lozenges]1997-the lozenges for [his]60-waldo cough , even when [she]54-em saw [Gregory]156-gregory coming .

" [I]1994-him do not know how it is , "[1994-him] [she]54-em said humbly , nestling to [him]1994-him , " but [I]2006-the lover can not love [you]1994-him so much as [you]1994-him love [me]2006-the lover . Perhaps it is because [I]2006-the lover am only [a woman]540-a woman ; but [I]2006-the lover do love [you]1994-him as much as [I]2006-the lover can . "[2006-the lover]

Now [the Kaffir maids]1998-the kaffir maids were coming from [the huts]1999-the huts . [He]1994-him kissed [her]54-em again , eyes and mouth and hands , and left [her]54-em . [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie was well satisfied when told of the betrothment . [She]53-tant ' sannie [herself]53-tant ' sannie contemplated marriage within the year with one or other of [her]53-tant ' sannie numerous " vrijers , "[2006-the lover] and [she]53-tant ' sannie suggested that the weddings might take place together . [Em]54-em set to work busily to prepare [her]54-em own household linen and wedding garments . [Gregory]156-gregory was with [her]54-em daily , almost hourly , and the six months which elapsed before [Lyndall]59-lyndall 's return passed , as [he]1994-him felicitously phrased it , " like a summer night , when [you]4271-you are dreaming of [some one [you]4271-you love]4272-some one you love . "[54-em]

Late one evening , [Gregory]156-gregory sat by [[his]156-gregory little love]2000-his little love , turning the handle of [her]54-em machine as [she]54-em drew [her]54-em work through it , and [they]2001-they talked of the changes [they]2001-they would make when [the Boer - woman]214-the boer - woman was gone , and [the farm]260-the farm belonged to [them]2001-they alone . There should be [a new room]2004-a new room [here]3430-here , and a kraal there . So [they]2001-they chatted on . Suddenly [Gregory]156-gregory dropped the handle , and impressed a fervent kiss on the fat hand that guided the linen . " [You]2000-his little love are so beautiful , [Em]54-em , "[54-em] said [the lover]2006-the lover . " It comes over [me]54-em in a flood suddenly how [I]54-em love [you]2000-his little love . "[54-em] [Em]54-em smiled .

" [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie says when [I]2007-i am [her]53-tant ' sannie age [no one]237-no one will look at [me]2007-i ; and it is true . [My]2007-i hands are as short and broad as a duck 's foot , and [my]2007-i forehead is so low , and [I]2007-i have n't any nose . [I]2007-i ca n't be pretty . "[2007-i]

[She]54-em laughed softly . It was so nice to think [he]156-gregory should be so blind .

" When [[my]54-em cousin]4251-my cousin comes to - morrow [you]156-gregory will see [a beautiful woman]4275-a beautiful woman , [Gregory]156-gregory , "[54-em] [she]54-em added presently . " [She]4275-a beautiful woman is like [a little queen]4276-a little queen : [her]4275-a beautiful woman shoulders are so upright , and [her]4275-a beautiful woman head looks as though it ought to have a little crown upon it . [You]156-gregory must come to see [her]4275-a beautiful woman to - morrow as soon as [she]4275-a beautiful woman comes . [I]54-em am sure [you]156-gregory will love [her]4275-a beautiful woman . "[54-em]

" Of course [I]54-em shall come to see [her]4275-a beautiful woman , since [she]4275-a beautiful woman is [[your]156-gregory cousin]4277-your cousin ; but do [you]156-gregory think [I]54-em could ever think [any woman as lovely as [I]54-em think [you]156-gregory]4278-any woman as lovely as i think you ? "[54-em]

[He]2007-i fixed [his]2007-i seething eyes upon [her]2008-her . " [You]2007-i could not help seeing that [she]4275-a beautiful woman is prettier , "[156-gregory] said [Em]54-em , slipping [her]54-em right hand into [his]2007-i ; " but [you]2007-i will never be able to like [any one]504-any one so much as [you]2007-i like [me]54-em . "[54-em]

Afterward , when [she]54-em wished [[her]54-em lover]2009-her lover good night , [she]54-em stood upon the doorstep to call a greeting after [him]2007-i ; and [she]54-em waited , as [she]54-em always

did , till the brown pony 's hoofs became inaudible behind the " kopje . "[54-em]

Then [she]54-em passed through [the room where [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie lay snoring]2010-the room where tant ' sannie lay snoring , and through [the little room that was all draped in white , waiting for [[her]54-em cousin]1312-her cousin 's return]2011-the little room that was all draped in white , waiting for her cousin 's return , on to [[her]54-em own room]2013-her own room .

[She]54-em went to the chest of drawers to put away the work [she]54-em had finished , and sat down on the floor before the lowest drawer . In it were the things [she]54-em was preparing for [her]54-em marriage . Piles of white linen , and some aprons and quilts ; and in a little box in the corner a spray of orange - blossom which [she]54-em had bought from a smouse . There too was a ring [Gregory]156-gregory had given [her]54-em , and a veil [[his]156-gregory sister]1927-his sister had sent , and there was a little roll of fine embroidered work which [Trana]128-trana had given [her]54-em . It was too fine and good even for [[Gregory]156-gregory 's wife]2015-gregory 's wife just right for something very small and soft . [She]54-em would keep it . And [she]54-em touched it gently with [her]54-em forefinger , smiling ;

and then [she]54-em blushed and hid it far behind the other things . [She]54-em knew so well all that was in that drawer , and yet [she]54-em turned them all over as though [she]54-em saw them for the first time , packed them all out , and packed them all in , without one fold or crumple ; and then sat down and looked at them .

To - morrow evening when [Lyndall]59-lyndall came [she]59-lyndall would bring [her]54-em [here]3430-here , and show [it]3430-here [her]54-em all . [Lyndall]59-lyndall would so like to see it the little wreath , and the ring , and the white veil ! It would be so nice ! Then [Em]54-em fell to seeing pictures . [Lyndall]59-lyndall should live with [them]2017-them till [she]59-lyndall [herself]59-lyndall got married some day . Every day when [Gregory]156-gregory came [home]302-home , tired from [his]156-gregory work , and [he]156-gregory would look about and say , " Where is [[my]54-em wife]3448-my wife ? Has [no one]237-no one seen [[my]54-em wife]3448-my wife ? [Wife]3621-wife , some coffee ! "[54-em] and [she]54-em would give [him]156-gregory some .

[Em]54-em 's little face grew very grave at last , and

[she]54-em knelt up and extended [her]54-em hands over the drawer of linen .

" Oh , [God]56-god ! "[54-em] [she]54-em said , " [I]54-em am so glad ! [I]54-em do not know what [I]54-em have done that [I]54-em should be so glad . Thank [you]156-gregory ! "[54-em]

CHAPTER IV . [LYNDALL]59-lyndall .

[SHE]59-lyndall was more like [a princess]2019-a princess , yes , far more like [a princess]2019-a princess , than [the lady who still hung on the wall in [[Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie 's bed - room]2022-tant ' sannie 's bed - room]2021-the lady who still hung on the wall in tant ' sannie 's bed - room . So [Em]54-em thought . [She]59-lyndall leaned back in the little armchair ; [she]59-lyndall wore a grey dressing - gown , and [her]59-lyndall long hair was combed out and hung to the ground . [Em]54-em , sitting before [her]59-lyndall , looked up with mingled respect and admiration .

[Lyndall]59-lyndall was tired after [her]59-lyndall long journey , and had come to [[her]59-lyndall room]1009-her room early . [Her]59-lyndall eyes ran over the familiar objects . Strange to go away for four years , and come back , and find that the candle standing on the dressing - table still cast the

shadow of [an old crone]2024-an old crone 's head in the corner beyond the clothes - horse . Strange that even a shadow should last longer than [a man]242-a man ! [She]59-lyndall looked about among the old familiar objects ; all was there , but the old self was gone .

" What are [you]59-lyndall noticing ? "[54-em] asked [Em]54-em . " Nothing and everything . [I]59-lyndall thought the windows were higher . If [I]59-lyndall were [you]59-lyndall , when [I]59-lyndall get [this place]464-this place [I]59-lyndall should raise the walls . There is not room to breathe [here]3430-here ; one suffocates . "[59-lyndall] " [Gregory]156-gregory is going to make many alterations , "[59-lyndall] said [Em]54-em ; and drawing nearer to the grey dressing - gown respectfully . " Do [you]59-lyndall like [him]156-gregory , [Lyndall]59-lyndall ? Is [he]156-gregory not handsome ? "[59-lyndall] " [He]156-gregory must have been [a fine baby]4286-a fine baby , "[2026-they] said [Lyndall]59-lyndall , looking at the white dimity curtain that hung above the window . [Em]54-em was puzzled .

" There are [some men]1735-some men , "[54-em] said [Lyndall]59-lyndall , " whom [you]54-em never can believe were [babies at all]4288-babies at all ; and[59-lyndall]

others [you]54-em never see without thinking how very nice [they]2026-they must have looked when [they]2026-they wore socks and pink sashes . "[59-lyndall]

[Em]54-em remained silent ; then [she]54-em said with a little dignity ,

" When [you]54-em know [him]156-gregory [you]54-em will love [him]156-gregory as [I]3470-men do . When [I]3470-men compare [other people]4289-other people with [him]156-gregory , [they]4289-other people seem so weak and little . [Our]4290-our hearts are so cold , [our]4290-our loves are mixed up with so many other things . But [he]156-gregory [no one]237-no one is worthy of [his]156-gregory love . [I]3470-men am not . It is so great and pure . "[3470-men]

" [You]54-em need not make [yourself]54-em unhappy upon that point [your]54-em poor return for [his]156-gregory love , [[my]54-em dear]3426-my dear , "[54-em] said [Lyndall]59-lyndall . " [A man]242-a man 's love is a fire of olive - wood . It leaps higher every moment ; it roars , it blazes , it shoots out red flames ; it threatens to wrap [you]2027-you round and devour [you]2027-you [you]2027-you [who stand by like an icicle in the glow of its fierce warmth]4294-who stand by like an icicle in the glow of its fierce warmth . [You]2027-you are self - reproached at [your]2027-you own chilliness and want of reciprocity .[54-em]

The next day , when [you]2027-you go to warm [your]2027-you hands a little , [you]2027-you find a few ashes ! ' Tis a long love and cool against a short love and hot ; [men]3470-men , at all events , have nothing to complain of . "[59-lyndall]

" [You]2027-you speak so because [you]2027-you do not know [men]3470-men , "[54-em] said [Em]54-em , instantly assuming the dignity of superior knowledge so universally affected by affianced and married women in discussing [man]329-man 's nature with [[their]3470-men uncontracted sisters]2030-their uncontracted sisters . " [You]2027-you will know [them]3470-men too some day , and then [you]2027-you will think differently , "[54-em] said [Em]54-em , with the condescending magnanimity which superior knowledge can always afford to show to ignorance . [Lyndall]59-lyndall 's little lip quivered in a manner indicative of intense amusement . [She]59-lyndall twirled a massive ring upon [her]59-lyndall forefinger a ring more suitable for the hand of [a man]242-a man , and noticeable in design a diamond cross let into gold , with the initials " R.R. "[59-lyndall] below it .

" Ah , [Lyndall]59-lyndall , "[59-lyndall] [Em]54-em cried , " perhaps [you]59-lyndall are engaged [yourself]59-lyndall that is why [you]59-lyndall smile . Yes ; [I]59-lyndall am sure [you]59-lyndall are . Look at this ring ! "[59-lyndall] [Lyndall]59-lyndall drew the hand quickly from [her]59-lyndall . " [I]59-lyndall am not in so great a hurry to put [my]59-lyndall neck beneath [any man]1206-any man 's foot ; and [I]59-lyndall do not so greatly admire the crying of [babies]4297-babies , "[59-lyndall] [she]59-lyndall said , as [she]59-lyndall closed [her]59-lyndall eyes half wearily and leaned back in the chair . " There are [other women glad of such work]4298-other women glad of such work . "[59-lyndall]

[Em]54-em felt rebuked and ashamed . How could [she]59-lyndall take [Lyndall]59-lyndall and show [her]59-lyndall the white linen and the wreath , and the embroidery ? [She]59-lyndall was quiet for a little while , and then began to talk about [Trana]128-trana , and [the old farm - servants]2032-the old farm - servants , till [she]59-lyndall saw [[her]59-lyndall companion]341-her companion was weary ; then [she]59-lyndall rose and left [her]341-her companion for the night . But after [Em]54-em was gone [Lyndall]59-lyndall sat on , watching [the old crone]2034-the old crone 's face in the corner , and with a weary look , as

though the whole world 's weight rested on [these frail young shoulders]2035-these frail young shoulders .

The next morning , [Waldo]60-waldo , starting off before breakfast with a bag of mealies slung over [his]60-waldo shoulder to feed the ostriches , heard a light step behind [him]60-waldo . " Wait for [me]59-lyndall ; [I]59-lyndall am coming with [you]60-waldo , "[59-lyndall] said [Lyndall]59-lyndall , adding as [she]59-lyndall came up to [him]60-waldo , " If [I]59-lyndall had not gone to look for [you]60-waldo yesterday [you]60-waldo would not have come to greet [me]59-lyndall till now . Do [you]60-waldo not like [me]59-lyndall any longer , [Waldo]60-waldo ? "[59-lyndall] " Yes but [you]60-waldo are changed . "[59-lyndall] It was the old clumsy , hesitating mode of speech .

" [You]60-waldo like the pinafores better ? "[2037-an uncomprehended cipher] [she]59-lyndall said quickly . [She]59-lyndall wore a dress of a simple cotton fabric , but very fashionably made , and on [her]59-lyndall head was a broad white hat . To [Waldo]60-waldo [she]59-lyndall seemed superbly attired . [She]59-lyndall saw it . " [My]60-waldo dress has changed a little , "[60-waldo] [she]59-lyndall said , " and [I]0-i also ;[0-i]

but not to [you]60-waldo . Hang the bag over [your]60-waldo other shoulder , that [I]0-i may see [your]60-waldo face . [You]60-waldo say so little that if [one]324-one does not look at [you]60-waldo [you]60-waldo are [an uncomprehended cipher]2037-an uncomprehended cipher . " [Waldo]60-waldo changed the bag , and [they]2038-they walked on side by side . "[60-waldo] [You]60-waldo have improved , " [she]4299-she said . "[2041-she] Do [you]60-waldo know that [I]0-i have sometimes wished to see [you]60-waldo while [I]0-i was away ; not often , but still sometimes . "[2041-she]

[They]2038-they were at the gate of [the first camp]2039-the first camp now . [Waldo]60-waldo threw over a mug of mealies , and [they]2038-they walked on over [the dewy ground]2040-the dewy ground . " Have [you]2041-she learnt much ? "[2048-a girls ' boarding - school] [he]60-waldo asked [her]2041-she simply , remembering how [she]2041-she had once said , " When [I]0-i come back again [I]0-i shall know everything that [a human being]4300-a human being can . "[0-i] [She]2041-she laughed .

" Are [you]60-waldo thinking of [my]4310-the drove old boast ? Yes ; [I]4310-the drove have learnt something , though hardly what [I]4310-the drove expected , and not quite so much . In the first place , [I]4310-the drove have learnt that [one of [[my]4310-the drove ancestors]4302-my ancestors]4301-one of my ancestors[4310-the drove]

must have been [a very great fool]2042-a very great fool ; for [they]2043-they say nothing comes out in [a man]242-a man but [one of [[his]242-a man forefathers]2046-his forefathers]2045-one of his forefathers possessed it before [him]242-a man . In the second place , [I]0-i have discovered that of all cursed places under the sun , where [the hungriest soul]2047-the hungriest soul can hardly pick up a few grains of knowledge , [a girls ' boarding - school]2048-a girls ' boarding - school is the worst . [They]2048-a girls ' boarding - school are called [finishing schools]2049-finishing schools , and the name tells accurately what [they]2048-a girls ' boarding - school are . [They]2048-a girls ' boarding - school finish everything but imbecility and weakness , and that [they]2048-a girls ' boarding - school cultivate . [They]2048-a girls ' boarding - school are nicely adapted machines for experimenting on the question , " Into how little space [a human soul]4303-a human soul can be crushed?í [I]0-i have seen some souls so compressed that [they]4304-they would have fitted into a small thimble , and found room to move there , wide room . [A woman who has been for many years in [one of those places]4306-one of those places]4305-a woman who has been for many years in one of those places carries the mark of the beast on [her]4305-a woman who has been for many years in one of those places till [she]4305-a woman who has been for many years in one of those places dies , though [she]4305-a woman who has been for many years in one of those places may expand a little afterward , when [she]4305-a woman who has been for many years in one of those places breathes in [the free world]4307-the free world . "[0-i]

" Were [you]2050-you miserable ? "[2057-she] [he]0-i asked , looking at [her]2050-you with quick anxiety .

" [I]2056-i ? no . [I]2056-i am never miserable and never happy . [I]2056-i wish [I]2056-i were . But [I]2056-i should have run away from [the place]3955-the place on the fourth day , and hired [myself]2056-i to [the first Boer - woman whose farm [I]2056-i came to]4309-the first boer - woman whose farm i came to , to make fire under [her]4309-the first boer - woman whose farm i came to soap - pot , if [I]2056-i had to live as the rest of [the drove]4310-the drove did . Can [you]0-i form an idea , [Waldo]60-waldo , of what it must be to be shut up with [cackling old women , who are without knowledge of life]4311-cackling old women , who are without knowledge of life , without love of the beautiful , without strength , to have [your]0-i soul cultured by [them]4311-cackling old women , who are without knowledge of life ? It is suffocation only to breathe the air [they]4311-cackling old women , who are without knowledge of life breathe ; but [I]2056-i made [them]4311-cackling old women , who are without knowledge of life give [me]2056-i [room]1056-room . [I]2056-i did not learn music , because [I]2056-i had no[2056-i]

talent ; and when [the drove]4310-the drove made cushions , and hideous flowers that the roses laugh at , and a footstool in six weeks that a machine would have made better in five minutes , [I]0-i went to [[my]0-i room]3536-my room . With the money saved from such work [I]0-i bought books and newspapers , and at night [I]0-i sat up . [I]0-i read , and epitomized what [I]0-i read ; and [I]0-i found time to write some plays , and find out how hard it is to make [your]2053-your thoughts look anything but imbecile fools when [you]2053-your paint them with ink and paper . In the holidays [I]0-i learnt a great deal more . [I]0-i made [acquaintances]2054-acquaintances , saw a few places and [many people]2055-many people , and some different ways of living , which is more than any books can show one . On the whole , [I]0-i am not dissatisfied with [my]0-i four years . [I]0-i have not learnt what [I]0-i expected ; but [I]0-i have learnt something else . What have [you]0-i been doing ? "[2057-she]

" Nothing . "[0-i]

" That is not possible . [I]2057-she shall find out by and by . "[2057-she] [They]2056-i still stepped on side by side over the dewy bushes . Then suddenly [she]2057-she turned on [him]0-i . " [I]2057-she thought not . Even [you]0-i are too worldly wise for that . [I]2057-she never met a man who did . " [I]2060-i thought not . [No one]237-no one does , unless [they]237-no one are in need of a subject upon which to show [their]237-no one wit . frost]4334-the frost one night , and [I]0-i got nipped internally it feels so ! "[2063-i]

" Show [me]2063-i what [you]2061-you feel , "[2063-i] [he]2062-i said . " [I]2063-i have only a few old thoughts , and [I]2063-i think them over and over again ; always beginning where [I]2063-i left off . [I]2063-i never get any further . [My]234-the boy head swings sometimes . But this one thought stands , never goes if [I]234-the boy might but be one of these born in the future ; then perhaps to be born [a woman]540-a woman will not be to be born branded . "[234-the boy] [Waldo]60-waldo looked at [her]2063-i . It was hard to say whether [she]2063-i were in earnest or mocking . " [I]234-the boy know it is foolish . Wisdom never kicks at the iron walls it ca n't bring down , "[234-the boy] [she]2063-i said .

" But [we]4339-us are cursed . [Waldo]60-waldo , born cursed from the time [[our]4339-us mothers]1880-our mothers bring [us]4339-us into [the world]252-the world till the shrouds are put on [us]4339-us . Do not look at [me]2063-i as though [I]2063-i were talking nonsense . Everything has two sides the outside that is ridiculous , and the inside that is solemn . "[2063-i] " [I]2063-i am not laughing , "[2063-i] said [the boy]234-the boy solemnly enough ; " but what curses [you]2063-i ? "[2063-i] [He]60-waldo thought [she]2063-i would not reply to [him]60-waldo , [she]2063-i waited so long .

" It is not what is done to [us]4339-us , but what is made of [us]4339-us , "[2063-i] [she]2063-i said at last , " that wrongs [us]4339-us . [No man]339-no man can be really injured but by what modifies [himself]339-no man . [We]4339-us all enter [the world]252-the world little plastic beings , with so much natural force perhaps , but for the rest blank ; and [the world]252-the world tells [us]4339-us what [we]4339-us are to be , and shapes [us]4339-us by the ends it sets before [us]4339-us . To [you]2065-you it says "[1671-women] Work ; " and to [us]2066-us it says "[1671-women] Seem ! " To [you]2065-you it says As [you]2065-you approximate to [man]329-man 's highest ideal of God , as [your]2065-you arm[2071-we]

is strong and [your]2065-you knowledge great , and the power to labour is with [you]2065-you , so [you]2065-you shall gain all that human heart desires . To [us]2066-us it says Strength shall not help [you]2065-you , nor knowledge , nor labour . [You]2065-you shall gain what [men]3470-men gain , but by other means . And so [the world]252-the world makes [men]3470-men and [women]1671-women .

" Look at this little chin of [mine]4346-mine , [Waldo]60-waldo , with the dimple in it . It is but a small part of [[my]2077-the person i am talking to person]4347-my person ; but though [I]2077-the person i am talking to had a knowledge of all things under the sun , and the wisdom to use it , and the deep loving heart of [an angel]4348-an angel , it would not stead [me]2077-the person i am talking to through life like this little chin . [I]2077-the person i am talking to can win money with it , [I]2077-the person i am talking to can win love ; [I]2077-the person i am talking to can win power with it , [I]2077-the person i am talking to can win fame . What would knowledge help [me]2077-the person i am talking to ? The less [a woman]540-a woman has in [her]540-a woman head the lighter [she]540-a woman is for climbing . [I]2077-the person i am talking to once heard [an old man]4141-an old man say , that [he]4141-an old man never saw intellect help [a woman so much as a pretty ankle]4351-a woman so much as a pretty ankle ; and it was the truth . [They]279-the boys begin to[2077-the person i am talking to]

shape [us]2071-we to [our]2071-we cursed end , " [she]540-a woman said , with [her]540-a woman lips drawn in to look as though [they]279-the boys smiled , "[2077-the person i am talking to] when [we]2071-we are tiny things in shoes and socks . [We]2071-we sit with [our]2071-we little feet drawn up under [us]2071-we in the window , and look out at [the boys]279-the boys in [their]279-the boys happy play . [We]2071-we want to go . Then a loving hand is laid on [us]2071-we : " [Little one]4352-little one , [you]2071-we can not go , í [they]279-the boys say ; "[2077-the person i am talking to] [your]2071-we little face will burn , and [your]2071-we nice white dress be spoiled.í [We]2071-we feel it must be for [our]2071-we good , it is so lovingly said : but [we]2071-we can not understand ; and [we]2071-we kneel still with one little cheek wistfully pressed against the pane . Afterwards [we]2071-we go and thread blue beads , and make a string for [our]2071-we neck ; and [we]2071-we go and stand before the glass . [We]2071-we see the complexion [we]2071-we were not to spoil , and the white frock , and [we]2071-we look into [our]2071-we own great eyes . Then the curse begins to act on [us]2071-we . [It]2073-it finishes its work when [we]2071-we are [grown women , who no more look out wistfully at a more healthy life]2074-grown women , who no more look out wistfully at a more healthy life ; [we]2071-we are

contented . [We]2071-we fit [our]2071-we sphere as [a Chinese - woman]2075-a chinese - woman 's foot fits [her]2075-a chinese - woman shoe exactly , as though [God]56-god had made both and yet [He]56-god knows nothing of either . In some of [us]2071-we the shaping of [our]2071-we end has been quite completed . The parts [we]2071-we are not to use have been quite atrophied , and have even dropped off ; but in others , and [we]2071-we are not less to be pitied , [they]2076-they have been weakened and left . [We]2071-we wear the bandages , but [our]2071-we limbs have not grown to them ; [we]2071-we know that [we]2071-we are compressed , and chafe against [them]2076-they .

" But what does it help ? A little bitterness , a little longing when [we]2071-we are young , a little futile searching for work , a little passionate striving for room for the exercise of [our]2071-we powers , and then [we]2071-we go with [the drove]4310-the drove . [A woman]540-a woman must march with [her]540-a woman regiment . In the end [she]540-a woman must be trodden down or go with it ; and if [she]540-a woman is wise [she]540-a woman goes .[2087-our nurses]

" [I]2085-the boer - wife see in [your]2079-you great eyes what [you]2079-you are[2085-the boer - wife]

thinking , " [she]2085-the boer - wife said , glancing at [him]2079-you ; "[2085-the boer - wife] [I]0-i always know what [the person [I]0-i am talking to]2077-the person i am talking to is thinking of . How is [this woman who makes such a fuss worse off than]2078-this woman who makes such a fuss worse off than [I]0-i ? [I]0-i will show [you]2079-you by a very little example . [We]2080-we stand here at this gate this morning , both poor , both young , both friendless ; there is not much to choose between [us]2080-we . Let [us]2080-we turn away just as [we]2080-we are , to make [our]2080-we way in life . This evening [you]2079-you will come to [[a farmer]1946-a farmer 's house]2082-a farmer 's house . [The farmer]2083-the farmer , albeit [you]2079-you come alone on foot , will give [you]2079-you a pipe of tobacco and a cup of coffee and a bed . If [he]2083-the farmer has no dam to build and [no child]2084-no child to teach , to - morrow [you]2079-you can go on [your]2079-you way with a friendly greeting of the hand . [I]0-i , if [I]0-i come to the same place to - night , will have strange questions asked [me]0-i , strange glances cast on [me]0-i . [The Boer - wife]2085-the boer - wife will shake [her]2085-the boer - wife head and give [me]0-i food to eat with [the Kaffirs]111-the kaffirs , and a right to sleep with the dogs . That would be the first step in [our]2080-we

progress a very little one , but every step to the end would repeat it . [We]2080-we were [equals]2086-equals once when [we]2080-we lay new - born babes on [[our]2080-we nurses]2087-our nurses ' knees . [We]2080-we will be [equals]2086-equals again when [they]2087-our nurses tie up [our]2080-we jaws for the last sleep . "[2087-our nurses]

[Waldo]60-waldo looked in wonder at the little quivering face ; it was a glimpse into a world of passion and feeling wholly new to [him]60-waldo .

" Mark [you]60-waldo , "[2087-our nurses] [she]2085-the boer - wife said , " [we]2080-we have always this advantage over [you]60-waldo [we]2080-we can at any time step into ease and competence , where [you]60-waldo must labour patiently for it . [They]2087-our nurses both earn [their]2087-our nurses bread in one way .

" [She]2090-a woman who has sold herself , even for a ring and a new name , need hold her skirt aside for no creature in the street ran [her]2090-a woman who has sold herself , even for a ring and a new name , need hold her skirt aside for no creature in the street little finger savagely along the topmost bar , shaking off the dozen little dewdrops that still hung there . " [she]2090-a woman who has sold herself , even for a ring and a new name , need hold her skirt aside for no creature in the street cried . "[2103-she] When [we]2094-we ask to be [doctors]2096-doctors , [lawyers]2097-lawyers , [law - makers]2098-law - makers , [anything but ill - paid drudges]2099-anything but ill - paid drudges , [they]2087-our nurses say , No ; but [you]2100-you have [men]3470-men 's chivalrous attention ; now think of that and be satisfied ! What would [you]2100-you do without it ? "[2105-i]

The bitter little silvery laugh , so seldom heard , rang out across [the bushes]2102-the bushes . [She]2103-she bit [her]2103-she little teeth together .

" [I]2105-i was coming up in [Cobb and Co. 's]40-cobb and co. 's the other day . At [a little wayside hotel]4356-a little wayside hotel [we]2094-we had to change [the large coach]4357-the large coach for a small one . " The bees are very attentive to the flowers till [their]3470-men honey is done , and then they fly over [them]3470-men . "[693-the woman] " But [some women]4375-some women , "[162-goethe] said [Waldo]60-waldo , speaking as though the words forced themselves from [him]60-waldo at that moment , " [some women]4375-some women have power . "[2128-she] [She]693-the woman lifted [her]693-the woman beautiful eyes to [his]60-waldo face .

" Power ! Did [you]2115-you ever hear of [men]3470-men being asked whether [other souls]4378-other souls should have power or not ? It is born in [them]3470-men . [You]2115-you may dam up[2128-she]

the fountain of water , and make [it]2113-it [a stagnant marsh]2114-a stagnant marsh , or [you]2115-you may let it run free and do its work ; but [you]2115-you can not say whether it shall be there ; it is there . And it will act , if not openly for good , then covertly for evil ; but it will act . If [Goethe]162-goethe had been stolen away [a child]224-a child , and reared in a robber horde in [the depths of [a German forest]2118-a german forest]2117-the depths of a german forest , do [you]2115-you think [the world]252-the world would have had " Faustí and "[2130-we] Iphegenie?í But [he]162-goethe would have been [Goethe]162-goethe still stronger , wiser than [[his]162-goethe fellows]2120-his fellows . [His]162-goethe songs would have echoed on from [father]778-father to [son]779-son , and nerved the heart and arm for evil . Do [you]2115-you think if [Napoleon]80-napoleon an irishman had been born [a woman]540-a woman that [he]80-napoleon an irishman would have been contented to give small tea - parties and talk small scandal ? " Power ! "[2130-we] [she]2128-she said , suddenly , smiting [her]2128-she little hand upon the rail . " Yes , [we]4379-we have power ; and since [we]4379-we are not to expend it in [tunnelling mountains]4380-tunnelling mountains , nor healing diseases , nor making laws , nor money , nor on any extraneous object , [we]4379-we expend it on [you]4381-you . broken heart but [a woman]540-a woman was at the bottom of it . [We]2130-we are not to study law , nor science , nor art , so [we]2130-we study [you]2131-you . [We]2130-we keep six of [you]2131-you dancing in the palm of one little hand , " [she]540-a woman said , balancing [her]540-a woman outstretched arm gracefully , as though tiny beings disported [themselves]4384-themselves in its palm . "[2137-she] There was never [a man who said one word for [woman]2134-woman]2133-a man who said one word for woman but [he]2133-a man who said one word for woman said two for [man]329-man , and three for [the whole human race]2136-the whole human race . "[2138-they]

[She]2137-she watched the bird pecking up the last yellow grains ; but [Waldo]60-waldo looked only at [her]2137-she . When [she]2137-she spoke again it was very measuredly .

" [They]2138-they bring weighty arguments against [us]2130-we when [we]2130-we ask for the perfect freedom of [women]1671-women , "[2142-you] [she]2137-she said ; " but , when [you]2142-you come up to the objections , [they]2138-they are like pumpkin - devils , with[144-nature]

candles inside , hollow , and ca n't bite . [They]2138-they say that [women]1671-women do not wish for the sphere and freedom [we]2140-we ask for [them]1671-women , and would not use it !

" If the bird does like its cage , and does like [its]4386-its sugar and will not leave it , why keep the door so very carefully shut ? Why not open it , only a little ? Do [they]2138-they know , there is many a bird will not break its wings against the bars , but would fly if the doors were open .[60-waldo]

" Then [they]2138-they say again , "[2156-she] If [women]1671-women have the liberty [you]2142-you ask for , [they]1671-women will be found in positions for which [they]1671-women have not talent!í If [two men climb one ladder]2143-two men climb one ladder , did [you]2142-you ever see the weakest anywhere but at the foot ? The surest sign of fitness is success . [The weakest]2144-the weakest never wins but where there is handicapping . [Nature]144-nature , left to [herself]144-nature , will as beautifully apportion [a man]242-a man 's work to [his]242-a man capacities as long ages ago [she]144-nature graduated the colours on the bird 's breast . If [we]2140-we are not fit [you]2142-you give [us]2140-we to no purpose the

right to labour ; the work will fall out of [our]2140-we hands into [those that are abler]2146-those that are abler . "[2156-she]

[She]144-nature talked more quickly and eagerly as [she]144-nature went on , as one talks of that over which [they]1671-women have brooded long , and which lies near [their]1671-women hearts . [Waldo]60-waldo watched [her]144-nature intently .

" [They]1671-women say [women]1671-women have one great and noble work left [them]1671-women , and [they]1671-women do it ill . That is true ; [they]1671-women do it execrably . It is the work that demands the broadest culture , and [they]1671-women have not even the narrowest . [The lawyer]4388-the lawyer may see no deeper than [his]4388-the lawyer law books , and [the chemist]4389-the chemist see no further than the windows of [[his]4388-the lawyer laboratory]4390-his laboratory , and [they]1671-women may do [their]1671-women work well . But [the woman who does [woman]2134-woman 's work]4391-the woman who does woman 's work needs a many - sided , multiform culture ; the heights and depths of human life must strike an answering chord in [her]4391-the woman who does woman 's work ; [she]4391-the woman who does woman 's work must have knowledge of [men]3470-men and things in many states , a wide catholicity[2158-her children]

of sympathy , the strength that springs from knowledge , and the magnanimity which springs from strength . [We]2147-we bear [the world]252-the world , and [we]2147-we make it . [The souls of [little children]2150-little children]2149-the souls of little children are marvellously delicate and tender things , and keep for ever the shadow that first falls on [them]2150-little children , and that is [the mother]3579-the mother 's or at best [a woman]540-a woman 's . There was never [a great man who had not a great mother]2153-a great man who had not a great mother it is hardly an exaggeration . " The mightiest and noblest of human work is given to [us]2147-we , and [we]2147-we do it ill . [The meanest girl who[2156-she]

dances and dresses]4398-the meanest girl who dances and dresses becomes something higher when [[her]2157-her children]2158-her children look up into [her]2157-her face and ask [her]2157-her questions . " And [they]2158-her children say , "[2156-she] [she]2156-she went on , " that [we]2147-we complain of [woman]2134-woman 's being compelled to look upon marriage as a profession ; but that [she]2134-woman is free to enter upon it or leave it , as [she]2134-woman pleases .[2156-she]

" Yes and a cat set afloat in [a pond]4400-a pond is free to sit in the tub till it dies , it is under no obligation to wet [its]4400-a pond feet ; and [a drowning man]4401-a drowning man may catch at a straw or not , just as [he]4401-a drowning man likes it is a glorious liberty ! Let [any man]1206-any man think for five minutes of what old maidenhood means to [a woman]540-a woman and then let [him]1206-any man be silent . Is it easy to bear through life a name that in itself signifies defeat ? to dwell , as nine out of [ten unmarried women]4404-ten unmarried women must , under the finger of [another woman]4258-another woman ? Is it easy to look forward to an old age without honour , without the reward[2165-a hottentot]

of useful labour , without love ? [I]0-i wonder how many [men there are who would give up everything that is dear in life for the sake of maintaining a high purity]2159-men there are who would give up everything that is dear in life for the sake of maintaining a high purity . "[2172-wives]

[She]2156-she laughed , a little laugh that was clear without being pleasant . " And then , when [they]2159-men there are who would give up everything that is dear in life for the sake of maintaining a high purity have no other argument against [us]4406-us , [they]2159-men there are who would give up everything that is dear in life for the sake of maintaining a high purity say "[2172-wives] Go on ; but when [you]2160-you have made [women]1671-women what [you]2160-you wish , and [[her]1671-women children]2158-her children inherit [her]1671-women culture , [you]2160-you will defeat [yourself]2160-you . [Man]329-man will gradually become extinct from excess of intellect , the passions which replenish the race will die.í [Fools]1457-fools ! " [she]1671-women said , curling [her]1671-women pretty lip ; "[3492-the lord] [a Hottentot]2165-a hottentot sits at [the road]888-the road - side , and feeds on a rotten bone [he]2165-a hottentot has found there , and takes out [his]2165-a hottentot bottle of Cape - smoke and swills at it , and grunts with satisfaction ; and [the cultured child of the nineteenth century]2167-the cultured child of the nineteenth century sits in [his]2167-the cultured child of the nineteenth century arm - chair , and sips choice wines with the lip of [a connoisseur]2168-a connoisseur , and tastes delicate dishes with a

delicate palate , and with a satisfaction of which [the Hottentot]2169-the hottentot knows nothing . Heavy jaw and sloping forehead all have gone with increasing intellect ; but the animal appetites are there still refined , discriminative , but immeasurably intensified . [Fools]1457-fools ! Before [men]3470-men forgave or worshipped , while [they]3470-men were weak on [their]3470-men hind legs , did [they]3470-men not eat and drink and fight for [wives]2172-wives ? When all the latter additions to humanity have vanished , will not the foundation on which [they]3470-men are built remain ? "[2172-wives]

[She]2172-wives was silent then for a while , and said somewhat dreamily , more as though speaking to [herself]2172-wives than to [him]2173-you , " [They]3470-men ask , What will [you]2173-you gain , even if [man]329-man does not become extinct ? [you]2173-you will have brought justice and equality on to [the earth]335-the earth , and sent love from it . When [men]3470-men and [women]1671-women are [equals]2086-equals [they]2086-equals will love no more . [[Your]2173-you highly - cultured women]4412-your highly - cultured women will not be lovable , will not love .[2172-wives]

" Do [they]3470-men see nothing , understand nothing ? It is [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie who buries [husbands one after another]4413-husbands one after another , and folds [her]2172-wives hands resignedly , "[2172-wives] [The Lord]3492-the lord gave , and [the Lord]3492-the lord hath taken away , and blessed be the name of [the Lord]3492-the lord , í and [she]2172-wives looks for another .
