" [A great soul]4414-a great soul draws and is drawn with a more fierce intensity than any small one . By every inch [we]4415-we grow in intellectual height [our]4415-we love strikes down its roots deeper , and spreads out its arms wider . It is for love 's sake yet more than for any other that [we]4415-we look for that new time . "[60-waldo] [She]2172-wives had leaned [her]2172-wives head against the stones , and watched with [her]2172-wives sad , soft eyes the retreating bird . " Then when that time comes , "[60-waldo] [she]2172-wives said lowly , " when love is no more bought or sold , when it is not a means of making bread ,[2172-wives]

when [each woman]2179-each woman 's life is filled with earnest , independent labour , then love will come to [her]2172-wives , a strange , sudden sweetness breaking in upon [her]2172-wives earnest work ; not sought for , but found . Then , but not now "[2172-wives]

[Waldo]60-waldo waited for [her]2172-wives to finish the sentence , but [she]2172-wives seemed to have forgotten [him]60-waldo . " [Lyndall]59-lyndall , "[2172-wives] [he]60-waldo said , putting [his]60-waldo hand upon [her]2172-wives [she]2172-wives started " if [you]59-lyndall think that that new time will be so great , so good , [you]59-lyndall who speak so easily "[60-waldo] [She]2172-wives interrupted [him]60-waldo . " Speak ! speak ! "[60-waldo] [she]2172-wives said , " the difficulty is not to speak ; the difficulty is to keep silence . "[2172-wives] " But why do [you]2172-wives not try to bring that time ? "[2172-wives] [he]60-waldo said with pitiful simplicity . " When [you]2172-wives speak [I]2172-wives believe all [you]2172-wives say ; [other people]4289-other people would listen to [you]2172-wives also . "[2172-wives] " [I]2172-wives am not so sure of that , "[2172-wives] [she]2172-wives said with a smile .

Then over the small face came the weary look it had worn last night as [it]2180-it watched the shadow in the corner , Ah , so weary ! " [I]2172-wives , [Waldo]60-waldo , [I]2172-wives ? "[2172-wives] [she]2172-wives said . " [I]2172-wives will do nothing good for [myself]2172-wives , nothing for [the world]252-the world , till [some one]3445-some one wakes [me]2172-wives . [I]2172-wives am asleep , swathed , shut up in self ; till [I]2172-wives have been delivered [I]2172-wives will deliver [no one]237-no one . "[2172-wives] [He]2181-he looked at [her]2172-wives wondering , but [she]2172-wives was not looking at [him]2181-he .

" To see the good and the beautiful , "[60-waldo] [she]2172-wives said , " and to have no strength to live it , is only to be [Moses]92-moses on [the mountain of [Nebo]41-nebo]4420-the mountain of nebo , with [the land]4421-the land at [your]2181-he feet and no power to enter . It would be better not to see it . Come , "[59-lyndall] [she]2172-wives said , looking up into [his]2181-he face , and seeing [its]2181-he uncomprehending expression , " let [us]4422-us go , it is getting late . [Doss]70-doss is anxious for [his]70-doss breakfast also , "[60-waldo] [she]2172-wives added , wheeling round and calling to the dog , who was endeavouring to unearth a mole , an

occupation to which [he]2181-he had been zealously addicted from the third month , but in which [he]2181-he had never on any single occasion proved successful .

[Waldo]60-waldo shouldered [his]60-waldo bag , and [Lyndall]59-lyndall walked on before in silence , with the dog close to [her]59-lyndall side . Perhaps [she]59-lyndall thought of the narrowness of the limits within which [a human soul]4303-a human soul may speak and be understood by its nearest of mental kin , of how soon it reaches [that solitary land of the individual experience]2183-that solitary land of the individual experience , in which no fellow footfall is ever heard . Whatever [her]59-lyndall thoughts may have been , [she]59-lyndall was soon interrupted . [Waldo]60-waldo came close to [her]59-lyndall , and standing still , produced with awkwardness from [his]60-waldo breast - pocket a small carved box . " [I]60-waldo made it for [you]59-lyndall , "[60-waldo] [he]60-waldo said , holding it out . " [I]60-waldo like it , "[60-waldo] [she]59-lyndall said , examining it carefully .

The workmanship was better than that of the grave - post . The flowers that covered it were delicate , and here and there small conical

pro- protuberances

tuberances were let in among them . [She]59-lyndall turned it round critically . [Waldo]60-waldo bent over it lovingly .

" There is one strange thing about it , "[60-waldo] [he]60-waldo said earnestly , putting a finger on one little pyramid . " [I]60-waldo made it without these , and [I]60-waldo felt something was wrong ; [I]60-waldo tried many changes , and at last [I]60-waldo let these in , and then it was right . But why was it ? They are not beautiful in themselves . "[60-waldo] " They relieve the monotony of the smooth leaves , [I]59-lyndall suppose . "[59-lyndall] [He]60-waldo shook [his]60-waldo head as over a weighty matter . " The sky is monotonous , "[60-waldo] [he]60-waldo said , " when it is blue , and yet it is beautiful . [I]2186-he have thought of that often ; but it is not monotony and it is not variety makes beauty . What is it ? The sky , and [your]4423-your face , and this box the same thing is in them all , only more in the sky and in [your]4423-your face . But what is it ? "[2186-he] [She]59-lyndall smiled .

" So [you]60-waldo are at [your]60-waldo old work still . Why ,[156-gregory]

why , why ? What is the reason ? It is enough for [me]0-i , " [she]59-lyndall said , "[2186-he] if [I]0-i find out what is beautiful and what is ugly , what is real and what is not . Why it is there , and over the final cause of things in general , [I]0-i do n't trouble [myself]0-i ; there must be one , but what is it to [me]0-i ? If [I]0-i howl to all eternity [I]0-i shall never get hold of it ; and if [I]0-i did [I]0-i might be no better off . But [[you]2184-you [Germans]163-germans]2185-you germans are born with an aptitude for burrowing ; [you]2184-you ca n't help [yourselves]2184-you . [You]2184-you must sniff after reasons , just as that dog must after moles . [He]2186-he knows perfectly well [he]2186-he will never catch it , but [he]2186-he 's under the imperative necessity of digging for it . "[59-lyndall]

" But [he]2186-he might find it . "[59-lyndall]

" Might ! but [he]2186-he never has and never will . Life is too short to run after mights ; [we]2188-we must have certainties . "[60-waldo]

[She]2187-she tucked the box under [her]2187-she arm and was about to walk on , when [Gregory Rose]156-gregory , with

shining spurs , an ostrich feather in [his]156-gregory hat , and a silver - headed whip , careered past . [He]156-gregory bowed gallantly as [he]156-gregory went by . [They]2188-we waited till the dust of the horse 's hoofs had laid itself .

" There , "[60-waldo] said [Lyndall]59-lyndall , " goes [a true woman one born for the sphere that [some women]4375-some women have to fill without being born for it]4424-a true woman one born for the sphere that some women have to fill without being born for it . How happy [he]156-gregory would be sewing frills into [[his]156-gregory little girl]4426-his little girl 's frocks , and how pretty [he]156-gregory would look sitting in [a parlour]4427-a parlour , with [a rough man]4428-a rough man making love to [him]156-gregory ! Do n't [you]60-waldo think so ? "[59-lyndall] " [I]59-lyndall shall not stay [here]3430-here when [he]156-gregory is [master]4430-master , "[59-lyndall] [Waldo]60-waldo answered , not able to connect any kind of beauty with [Gregory Rose]156-gregory . " [I]60-waldo should imagine not . The rule of [a woman]540-a woman is tyranny ; but the rule of [a man - woman]4432-a man - woman grinds fine . Where are [you]59-lyndall going ? "[60-waldo] " Anywhere . "[59-lyndall] " What to do ? "[60-waldo] " See see everything . "[2189-she]

" [You]59-lyndall will be disappointed . "[2189-she] " And were [you]59-lyndall ? "[60-waldo]

" Yes ; and [you]59-lyndall will be more so . [I]2209-i want some things that [men]3470-men and [the world]252-the world give , [you]59-lyndall do not . If [you]59-lyndall have a few yards of earth to stand on , and a bit of blue over [you]59-lyndall , and something that [you]59-lyndall can not see to dream about , [you]59-lyndall have all that [you]59-lyndall need , all that [you]59-lyndall know how to use . But [I]2209-i like to see [real men]4435-real men . Let [them]4435-real men be as disagreeable as [they]4435-real men please , they are more interesting to [me]2209-i than flowers , or trees , or stars , or any other thing under the sun . Sometimes , "[2209-i] [she]2189-she added , walking on , and shaking the dust daintily from [her]2189-she skirts , " when [I]60-waldo am not too busy trying to find a new way of doing [my]60-waldo hair that will show [my]60-waldo little neck to better advantage , or over other work of that kind , sometimes it amuses [me]60-waldo intensely to trace out the resemblance between [one man]3454-one man and another : to see how [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie and [I]60-waldo , [you]2191-you and [Bonaparte]67-bonaparte , [St. Simon]164-st. simon on [his]164-st. simon[60-waldo]

pillow , and [the Emperor dining off larks]2190-the emperor dining off larks ' tongues , are one and the same compound , merely mixed in different proportions . What is microscopic in one is largely developed in another ; what is a rudimentary fold in [me]0-i is a great active organ in [you]2191-you ; but all things are in [all men]2192-all men , and one soul is the model of all . [We]2193-we shall find nothing new in human nature after [we]2193-we have once carefully dissected and analyzed [the one being [we]2193-we ever shall truly know ourself]2194-the one being we ever shall truly know ourself . [The Kaffir girl]817-the kaffir girl threw some coffee on [my]0-i arm in bed this morning ; [I]0-i felt displeased , but said nothing . [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie would have thrown the saucer at [her]817-the kaffir girl and sworn for an hour ; but the feeling would be the same irritated displeasure . If a huge animated stomach like [Bonaparte]67-bonaparte were put under a glass by [a skilful mental microscopist]2196-a skilful mental microscopist , [even]2197-even [he]2197-even would be found to have an embryonic doubling somewhere indicative of a heart , and rudimentary buddings that might have become conscience

and sincerity : Let [me]0-i take [your]2191-you arm [Waldo]60-waldo . How full [you]2191-you are of mealie dust . No , never mind . It will brush off . And sometimes what is more amusing still than tracing the likeness between [man]329-man and [man]329-man , is to trace the analogy there always is between the progress and development of [one individual]2200-one individual and of [a whole nation]2201-a whole nation ; or , again , between [a single nation]2202-a single nation and [the entire human race]2203-the entire human race . It is pleasant when it dawns on [you]2191-you that [the one]2204-the one is just the other written out in large letters ; and very odd to find all the little follies and virtues , and developments and retrogressions , written out in [the big world]2205-the big world 's book that [you]2191-you find in [your]2191-you little internal self . It is the most amusing thing [I]0-i know of ; but of course , being [a woman]540-a woman , [I]0-i have not often time for such amusements . Professional duties always first , [you]2191-you know . It takes a great deal of time and thought always to look perfectly exquisite even for [a pretty

woman]2207-a pretty woman . Is the old buggy still in existence , [Waldo]60-waldo ? "[2209-i]

" Yes ; but the harness is broken . "[2209-i] " Well , [I]2209-i wish [you]2191-you would mend it . [You]2191-you must teach [me]2209-i to drive . [I]2209-i must learn something while [I]2209-i am [here]3430-here . [I]2209-i got [the Hottentot girl]4438-the hottentot girl to show [me]2209-i how to make "[2209-i] sar - sar - tiesí this morning ; and [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie is going to teach [me]0-i to make " kapjes.í [I]3470-men will come and sit with [you]2191-you this afternoon while [you]2191-you mend the harness . "[3470-men] " Thank [you]2191-you . "[2215-her]

" No , do n't thank [me]952-the coloured woman ; [I]952-the coloured woman come for [my]952-the coloured woman own pleasure . [I]952-the coloured woman never find any one [I]952-the coloured woman can talk to . [Women]1671-women bore [me]952-the coloured woman , and [men]3470-men , [I]952-the coloured woman talk so to "[952-the coloured woman] Going to the ball this evening ? Nice little dog that of [yours]2208-yours . Pretty little ears . So fond of pointer pups!í And [they]2209-i think [me]0-i fascinating , charming ! [Men]3470-men are like [the earth]335-the earth , and [we]2212-we are the moon ; [we]2212-we turn always one side to [them]3470-men , and

[they]3470-men think there is no other , because [they]3470-men do n't see it but there is . "[952-the coloured woman]

[They]2213-they had reached [the house]206-the house now . " Tell [me]53-tant ' sannie when [you]60-waldo set to work , "[53-tant ' sannie] [she]2215-her said , and walked toward the door . [Waldo]60-waldo stood to look after [her]2215-her , and [Doss]70-doss stood at [his]60-waldo side , a look of painful uncertainty depicted on [his]70-doss small countenance , and one little foot poised in the air . Should [he]60-waldo stay with [[his]60-waldo master]361-his master or go ? [He]60-waldo looked at the figure with the wide straw hat moving toward [the house]206-the house , and [he]60-waldo looked up at [[his]60-waldo master]361-his master ; then [he]60-waldo put down the little paw and went . [Waldo]60-waldo watched [them]2213-they both in at the door and then walked away alone . [He]60-waldo was satisfied that at least [his]60-waldo dog was with [her]2215-her .

CHAPTER V. TANT ' [SANNIE]53-tant ' sannie HOLDS AN UPSITTING , AND [GREGORY]156-gregory WRITES A LETTER .

IT was just after sunset , and [Lyndall]59-lyndall had not yet returned from [her]59-lyndall first driving - lesson , when [the lean coloured woman standing at the corner of [the house]206-the house]2219-the lean coloured woman standing at the corner of the house to enjoy the evening breeze , saw coming along [the road]888-the road [a strange horseman]2222-a strange horseman . Very narrowly [she]2219-the lean coloured woman standing at the corner of the house surveyed [him]2222-a strange horseman , as slowly [he]2222-a strange horseman approached . [He]2222-a strange horseman was attired in the deepest mourning , the black crape round [his]2222-a strange horseman tall hat totally concealing the black felt , and nothing but a dazzling shirt - front relieving the funereal tone of [his]2222-a strange horseman attire . [He]2222-a strange horseman rode much forward in [his]2222-a strange horseman saddle , with [his]2222-a strange horseman chin resting on the uppermost

of [his]2222-a strange horseman shirt - studs , and there was an air of meek subjection to the will of Heaven , and to what might be in store for [him]2222-a strange horseman , that bespoke itself even in the way in which [he]2222-a strange horseman gently urged [his]2222-a strange horseman steed . [He]2222-a strange horseman was evidently in no hurry to reach [his]2222-a strange horseman destination , for the nearer [he]2222-a strange horseman approached to [it]2223-it [the slacker]2224-the slacker did [his]2222-a strange horseman bridle hang . [The coloured woman]952-the coloured woman having duly inspected [him]2222-a strange horseman , dashed into [the dwelling]2226-the dwelling .

" [Here]3430-here is [another one]4442-another one ! "[952-the coloured woman] [she]952-the coloured woman cried " [a widower]4443-a widower ; [I]952-the coloured woman see it by [his]2222-a strange horseman hat . "[952-the coloured woman] " [Good Lord]165-good lord ! "[222-the maid] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie ; " it 's the seventh [I]53-tant ' sannie 've had this month ; but [the men]1452-the men know where sheep and good looks and money in [the bank]4445-the bank are to be found , "[53-tant ' sannie] [she]952-the coloured woman added , winking knowingly . " How does [he]2228-he look ? "[53-tant ' sannie] " [Nineteen]166-nineteen , weak eyes , white hair , little round nose , "[0-i] said [the maid]222-the maid .

" Then it 's [he]2228-he ! then it 's [he]2228-he ! "[726-the young man] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie triumphantly ; " [little Piet Vander Walt]86-piet , whose[53-tant ' sannie]

wife died last month two farms , twelve thousand sheep . [I]0-i 've not seen [him]2228-he , but [[my]0-i sister - in - law]2229-my sister - in - law told [me]0-i about [him]2228-he , and [I]0-i dreamed about [him]2228-he last night . "[726-the young man]

Here [Piet]86-piet 's black hat appeared in the doorway , and [the Boer - woman]214-the boer - woman drew [herself]214-the boer - woman up in dignified silence , extended the tips of [her]214-the boer - woman fingers , and motioned solemnly to a chair . [The young man]726-the young man seated [himself]726-the young man , sticking [his]726-the young man feet as far under it as [they]2232-they would go , and said mildly " [I]726-the young man am [Little Piet Vander Walt]86-piet , and [[my]726-the young man father]3420-my father is [Big Piet Vander Walt]86-piet . "[726-the young man] [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie said solemnly , " Yes . "[726-the young man] " [Aunt]4447-aunt , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [the young man]726-the young man , starting up spasmodically ; " can [I]53-tant ' sannie off - saddle ? "[53-tant ' sannie] " Yes . "[2235-we] [He]726-the young man seized [his]726-the young man hat , and disappeared with a rush through the door .

" [I]53-tant ' sannie told [you]2234-you so ! [I]53-tant ' sannie knew it ! "[53-tant ' sannie] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie . " [The dear Lord]3742-the dear lord does n't send dreams for nothing .[53-tant ' sannie]

Did n't [I]0-i tell [you]2234-you this morning that [I]0-i dreamed of a great beast like a sheep , with red eyes , and [I]0-i killed it ? Was n't the white wool [his]726-the young man hair , and the red eyes [his]726-the young man weak eyes , and [my]0-i killing [him]726-the young man meant marriage ? Get supper ready quickly ; the sheep 's inside and roaster - cakes . [We]2235-we shall sit up to - night . "[726-the young man]

To [young Piet Vander Walt]86-piet that supper was a period of intense torture . There was something overawing in [that assembly of [English people]2237-english people]2236-that assembly of english people , with [their]2237-english people incomprehensible speech ; and moreover , it was [his]86-piet first courtship ; [[his]86-piet first wife]2238-his first wife had courted [him]86-piet , and ten months of severe domestic rule had not raised [his]86-piet spirit nor courage . [He]86-piet ate little , and when [he]86-piet raised a morsel to [his]86-piet lips glanced guiltily round to see if [he]86-piet were not observed . [He]86-piet had put three rings on [his]86-piet little finger , with the intention of sticking it out stiffly when [he]86-piet raised a coffee - cup ; now the little finger was curled miserably among its fellows . It

was small relief when the meal was over , and [Tant]53-tant ' sannie ' [Sannie]53-tant ' sannie and [he]86-piet repaired to [the front - room]2239-the front - room . Once seated there , [he]86-piet set [his]86-piet knees close together , stood [his]86-piet black hat upon them , and wretchedly turned the brim up and down . But supper had cheered [Tant]53-tant ' sannie ' [Sannie]53-tant ' sannie , who found it impossible longer to maintain that decorous silence , and whose heart yearned over [the youth]2240-the youth .

" [I]726-the young man was related to [[your]726-the young man aunt]4052-your aunt Selena who died , "[726-the young man] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie . " [[[My]53-tant ' sannie mother]3493-my mother 's step - brother 's child]4451-my mother 's step - brother 's child was married to [[[her]53-tant ' sannie father]3969-her father 's brother 's step - nephew 's niece]4453-her father 's brother 's step - nephew 's niece . "[53-tant ' sannie] " Yes , [aunt]3983-aunt , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [the young man]726-the young man , " [I]726-the young man knew [we]4455-we were related . "[726-the young man] " It was [[her]53-tant ' sannie cousin]1312-her cousin , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie , now fairly on the flow , " who had the cancer cut out of [her]53-tant ' sannie breast by [the other doctor]4457-the other doctor , who was not [the right doctor [they]4459-they sent for]4458-the right doctor they sent for , but who did it quite as well . "[53-tant ' sannie] " Yes , [aunt]3983-aunt , "[726-the young man] said [the young man]726-the young man .

" [I]53-tant ' sannie 've heard about it often , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie . " And [he]726-the young man was [the son of [the old doctor]4462-the old doctor that [they]4459-they say died on Christmas day]4461-the son of the old doctor that they say died on christmas day ; but [I]53-tant ' sannie do n't know if that 's true . [People]249-people do tell such awful lies . Why should [he]726-the young man die on Christmas day more than any other day ? "[53-tant ' sannie] " Yes , [aunt]3983-aunt , why ? "[53-tant ' sannie] said [the young man]726-the young man meekly . " Did [you]726-the young man ever have the toothache ? "[53-tant ' sannie] asked [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie . " No , [aunt]3983-aunt . "[214-the boer - woman]

" Well , [they]4459-they say [that doctor]4466-that doctor , not [the son of [the old doctor that died on Christmas day]4468-the old doctor that died on christmas day]4467-the son of the old doctor that died on christmas day , the other that did n't come when [he]726-the young man was sent for , [he]726-the young man gave such good stuff for the toothache , that if [you]726-the young man opened the bottle in [the room]215-the room where any one was bad [they]4459-they got better directly . [You]726-the young man could see it was good stuff , "[726-the young man] said [Tant]53-tant ' sannie ' [Sannie]53-tant ' sannie ; " it tasted horrid . That was [a real doctor]4470-a real doctor ! [He]4470-a real doctor used to give a bottle so high , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [the Boer - woman]214-the boer - woman , raising

[her]214-the boer - woman hand a foot from the table , " [you]726-the young man could drink at it for a month and it would n't get done , and the same medicine was good for all sorts of sicknesses croup , measles , jaundice , dropsy . Now [you]726-the young man have to buy a new kind for each sickness . [The doctors]4471-the doctors are n't so good as [they]4471-the doctors used to be . "[726-the young man]

" No , [aunt]3983-aunt , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [the young man]726-the young man , who was trying to gain courage to stick out [his]726-the young man legs and clink [his]726-the young man spurs together . [He]726-the young man did so at last . [Tant]53-tant ' sannie ' [Sannie]53-tant ' sannie had noticed the spurs before ; but [she]53-tant ' sannie thought it showed a nice manly spirit , and [her]53-tant ' sannie heart warmed yet more to [the youth]2240-the youth . " Did [you]726-the young man ever have convulsions when [you]726-the young man were [a baby]892-a baby ? "[53-tant ' sannie] asked [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie . " Yes , "[726-the young man] said [the young man]726-the young man . " Strange ! "[726-the young man] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie ; " [I]53-tant ' sannie had convulsions too . Wonderful that [we]4474-we should be so much alike ! "[53-tant ' sannie] " [Aunt]4475-aunt , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [the young man]726-the young man explosively , " can [we]4474-we sit - up to - night ? "[156-gregory]

[Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie hung [her]53-tant ' sannie head and half closed [her]53-tant ' sannie eyes ; but finding that [her]53-tant ' sannie little wiles were thrown away , [the young man]726-the young man staring fixedly at [his]726-the young man hat , [she]53-tant ' sannie simpered , " Yes , "[53-tant ' sannie] and went away to fetch candles . In [the dining room]1311-the dining room [Em]54-em worked at [her]54-em machine , and [Gregory]156-gregory sat close beside [her]54-em , [his]156-gregory great blue eyes turned to the window where [Lyndall]59-lyndall leaned out talking to [Waldo]60-waldo . [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie took two candles out of the cupboard and held them up triumphantly , winking all round [the room]215-the room . " [He]156-gregory 's asked for them , "[53-tant ' sannie] [she]53-tant ' sannie said . " Does [he]156-gregory want them for [his]156-gregory horse 's sore back ? "[53-tant ' sannie] asked [Gregory]156-gregory , new to up - country life . " No , "[726-the young man] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie , indignantly ; " [we]4476-we 're going to sit - up ! "[726-the young man] and [she]53-tant ' sannie walked off in triumph with the candles .

Nevertheless , when [all the rest of [the house]206-the house]2252-all the rest of the house had

retired , when the long candle was lighted , when the coffee - kettle was filled , when [she]53-tant ' sannie sat in [her]53-tant ' sannie elbow - chair , with [[her]53-tant ' sannie lover]2009-her lover on a chair close beside [her]53-tant ' sannie , and when the vigil of the night was fairly begun , [she]53-tant ' sannie began to find it wearisome . [The young man]726-the young man looked chilly , and said nothing .

" Wo n't [you]726-the young man put [your]726-the young man feet on [my]726-the young man stove ? "[726-the young man] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie . " No thank [you]53-tant ' sannie , [aunt]3983-aunt , "[726-the young man] said [the young man]726-the young man , and [both]750-both lapsed into silence . At last [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie , afraid of going to sleep , tapped a strong cup of coffee for [herself]53-tant ' sannie and handed another to [[her]53-tant ' sannie lover]2009-her lover . This visibly revived [both]750-both . " How long were [you]726-the young man married , [cousin]4478-cousin ? "[726-the young man] " Ten months , [aunt]3983-aunt . "[53-tant ' sannie] " How old was [[your]726-the young man baby]4480-your baby ? "[726-the young man] " Three days when it died . "[726-the young man] " It 's very hard when [we]4481-we must give [[our]4481-we husbands]4482-our husbands and [wives]2172-wives to [the Lord]3492-the lord , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie .

" Very , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [the young man]726-the young man ; " but it 's [the Lord]3492-the lord 's will . "[53-tant ' sannie] " Yes , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie , and sighed . " [She]53-tant ' sannie was such [a good wife]4486-a good wife , [aunt]3983-aunt : [I]53-tant ' sannie 've known [her]53-tant ' sannie break a churn - stick over [a maid]4488-a maid 's head for only letting dust come on a milk cloth . "[53-tant ' sannie] [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie felt a twinge of jealousy . [She]53-tant ' sannie had never broken a churn - stick on [a maid]4488-a maid 's head . " [I]726-the young man hope [[your]53-tant ' sannie wife]4489-your wife made a good end , "[726-the young man] [she]53-tant ' sannie said . " Oh , [beautiful]4490-beautiful , [aunt]3983-aunt : [she]53-tant ' sannie said up a psalm and two hymns and a half before [she]53-tant ' sannie died . "[726-the young man] " Did [she]53-tant ' sannie leave any messages ? "[53-tant ' sannie] asked [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie . " No , "[726-the young man] said [the young man]726-the young man ; " but the night before [she]53-tant ' sannie died [I]726-the young man was lying at the foot of [her]53-tant ' sannie bed ; [I]726-the young man felt [her]53-tant ' sannie foot kick [me]726-the young man . "[726-the young man] " [Piet]86-piet , í [she]53-tant ' sannie said . "[726-the young man] " [Annie]87-mary - ann , [my]0-i heart , í said [I.]0-i "[0-i] " [[My]0-i little baby that died yesterday]4492-my little baby that died yesterday has been here , and it stood over the waggon - box , í [she]53-tant ' sannie said .[0-i]

" "[2263-she] What did it say?í [I]0-i asked . " "[2267-a woman with a mole.í] It said that if [I]0-i died [you]0-i must marry a fat woman.í " "[2267-a woman with a mole.í] [I]0-i will , í [I]0-i said , and [I]0-i went to sleep again . Presently [she]2263-she woke [me]0-i . " "[2267-a woman with a mole.í] [The little baby]2264-the little baby has been [here]3430-here again , and it says [you]0-i must marry [a woman over thirty]2266-a woman over thirty , and who 's had two husbands.í " [I]2268-the redeemer did n't go to sleep after that for a long time , [aunt]3983-aunt ; but when [I]2268-the redeemer did [she]2263-she woke [me]2268-the redeemer . "[2268-the redeemer] " [The baby]4494-the baby has been [here]3430-here again , í [she]2268-the redeemer said , "[53-tant ' sannie] and it says [you]0-i must n't marry [a woman with a mole.í]2267-a woman with a mole.í [I]0-i told [her]2267-a woman with a mole.í [I]0-i would n't ; and the next day [she]2267-a woman with a mole.í died . " "[53-tant ' sannie] That was a vision from [the Redeemer]2268-the redeemer , " said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie .[726-the young man]

[The young man]726-the young man nodded [his]726-the young man head mournfully . [He]726-the young man thought of [a younger sister of [[his]726-the young man wife]3738-his wife 's who was not fat , and who had a mole , and of whom [[his]726-the young man wife]3738-his wife had always been jealous , and

[he]726-the young man wished [the little baby]2264-the little baby had liked better staying in heaven to coming and standing over the waggon - chest]2270-a younger sister of his wife 's who was not fat , and who had a mole , and of whom his wife had always been jealous , and he wished the little baby had liked better staying in heaven to coming and standing over the waggon - chest .

" [I]726-the young man suppose that 's why [you]726-the young man came to [me]726-the young man , "[726-the young man] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie . " Yes , [aunt]3983-aunt . And [pa]4497-pa said [I]726-the young man ought to get married before shearing time . It is bad if there 's [no one to see after things then]4498-no one to see after things then ; and [the maids]4499-the maids waste such a lot of fat . "[726-the young man] " When do [you]726-the young man want to get married ? "[53-tant ' sannie] " Next month , [aunt]3983-aunt , "[53-tant ' sannie] said [the young man]726-the young man in a tone of hopeless resignation . " May [I]214-the boer - woman kiss [you]3983-aunt , [aunt]3983-aunt ? "[214-the boer - woman] " Fie ! fie ! "[53-tant ' sannie] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie , and then gave [him]726-the young man a resounding kiss . " Come , draw [your]726-the young man chair a little closer , "[53-tant ' sannie] [she]53-tant ' sannie said , and [their]2275-their elbows now touching , [they]2275-their sat on through the night .

The next morning at dawn , as [Em]54-em passed through [[Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie 's bed - room]2022-tant ' sannie 's bed - room , [she]54-em found

[the Boer - woman]214-the boer - woman pulling off [her]214-the boer - woman boots preparatory to climbing into bed .

" Where is [Piet Vander Walt]86-piet ? "[53-tant ' sannie] " Just gone , "[156-gregory] said [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie ; " and [I]156-gregory am going to marry [him]86-piet this day four weeks . [I]156-gregory am dead sleepy , "[156-gregory] [she]53-tant ' sannie added ; " the stupid thing does n't know how to talk love - talk at all , "[156-gregory] and [she]53-tant ' sannie climbed into the four - poster , clothes and all , and drew the quilt up to [her]53-tant ' sannie chin .

On the day preceding [Tant]53-tant ' sannie ' [Sannie]53-tant ' sannie 's wedding , [Gregory Rose]156-gregory sat in the blazing sun on the stone wall behind [[his]156-gregory daub - and - wattle house]2278-his daub - and - wattle house . It was warm , but [he]156-gregory was intently watching a small buggy that was being recklessly driven over the bushes in the direction of [the farmhouse]643-the farmhouse . [Gregory]156-gregory never stirred till it had vanished ; then , finding the stones hot , [he]156-gregory slipped down and walked into [the house]206-the house . [He]156-gregory kicked the little pail that lay in the doorway , and sent it into

one corner ; that did [him]156-gregory good . Then [he]156-gregory sat down on the box , and began cutting letters out of a piece of newspaper . Finding that the snippings littered the floor , [he]156-gregory picked them up and began scribbling on [his]156-gregory blotting - paper . [He]156-gregory tried the effect of different initials before the name [Rose]156-gregory : G. Rose , E. Rose , L. Rose , L. Rose , L.L.L.L. Rose . When [he]156-gregory had covered the sheet , [he]156-gregory looked at it discontentedly a little while , then suddenly began to write a letter .

" [Beloved Sister]167-beloved sister ,[156-gregory]

" IT is a long while since [I]0-i last wrote to [you]167-beloved sister , but [I]0-i have had no time . This is the first morning [I]0-i have been at [home]302-home since [I]0-i do n't know when . [Em]54-em always expects [me]0-i to go down to [the farm - house]211-the farm - house in the morning ; but [I]0-i did n't feel as though [I]0-i could stand the ride to - day .[0-i]

" [I]2289-she have much news for [you]167-beloved sister .[2289-she]

" Tant ' [Sannie]53-tant ' sannie , [[Em]54-em 's Boer step - mother]4504-em 's boer step - mother , is to be married to - morrow . [She]53-tant ' sannie is gone to [town]1501-town to - day , and the wedding feast is to be at [[[her]53-tant ' sannie[157-jemima]

brother]4506-her brother 's farm]4507-her brother 's farm . [Em]54-em and [I]0-i are going to ride over on horseback , but [[her]54-em cousin]1312-her cousin is going to ride in the buggy with [that German]2282-that german . [I]0-i do n't think [I]0-i 've written to [you]2283-you since [she]54-em came back from [school]3436-school . [I]0-i do n't think [you]2283-you would like [her]54-em at all , [Jemima]157-jemima ; there 's something so proud about [her]54-em . [She]54-em thinks just because [she]54-em 's handsome there 's [nobody]658-nobody good enough to talk to [her]54-em , and just as if there had [nobody else]2286-nobody else but [her]54-em been to [boarding - school]1958-boarding - school before .

" [They]4508-they are going to have a grand affair to - morrow : [all the Boers]4509-all the boers about are coming , and [they]4508-they are going to dance all night ; but [I]157-jemima do n't think [I]157-jemima shall dance at all ; for , as [[Em]54-em 's cousin]4510-em 's cousin says , these Boer dances are low things . [I]157-jemima am sure [I]157-jemima only danced at the last to please [Em]54-em . [I]157-jemima do n't know why [she]54-em is so fond of dancing . [Em]54-em talked of [our]4511-our being married on the same day as [Tant ' Sannie]53-tant ' sannie ; but [I]157-jemima said it would be nicer for [her]54-em if [she]54-em waited till the shearing was over , and [I]157-jemima took [her]54-em down to see [you]4512-you . [I]157-jemima suppose [she]54-em will have to live with [us]4511-our [[Em]54-em 's cousin]4510-em 's cousin , [I]157-jemima mean , as [she]54-em has not anything in [the world]252-the world but a poor fifty pounds . [I]157-jemima do n't like [her]2289-she at all , [Jemima]157-jemima ,[157-jemima]

and [I]0-i do n't think [you]2288-you would . [She]2289-she 's got such queer ways ; [she]2289-she 's always driving about in a gig with [that low German]2290-that low german ; and [I]0-i do n't think it 's at all the thing for [a woman]540-a woman to be going about with [a man [she]540-a woman 's not engaged to]2292-a man she 's not engaged to . Do [you]2288-you ? If it was [me]0-i now , of course , who am a kind of connection , it would be different . The way [she]2289-she treats [me]0-i , considering that [I]0-i am so soon to be [[her]2289-she cousin]1312-her cousin , is not at all nice . [I]0-i took down [my]0-i album the other day with [your]2288-you likenesses in it , and [I]0-i told [her]2289-she [she]2289-she could look at it , and put it down close to [her]2289-she ; but [she]2289-she just said thank [you]2288-you , and never even touched it , as much as to say What are [your]2288-you relations to [me]0-i ?

" [She]2289-she gets the wildest horses in that buggy , and [a horrid snappish little cur belonging to [the German]281-the german]4515-a horrid snappish little cur belonging to the german sitting in front , and then [she]2289-she drives out alone . [I]242-a man do n't think it 's at all proper for [a woman]540-a woman to drive out alone ; [I]242-a man would n't allow it if [she]2289-she was [[my]242-a man sister]4518-my sister . The other morning , [I]242-a man do n't know how it happened , [I]242-a man was going in the way from which [she]2289-she was coming , and that little beast [they]4519-they call [him]4520-he [Doss]70-doss began to bark when [he]4520-he saw [me]242-a man [he]4520-he always does , [the little wretch]4521-the little wretch and the[242-a man]

horses began to spring , and kicked the splashboard all to pieces . It was a sight to see [Jemima]157-jemima ! [She]157-jemima has got the littlest hands [I]0-i ever saw [I]0-i could hold them both in one of mine , and not know that [I]0-i 'd got anything except that they were so soft ; but [she]157-jemima held those horses in as though they were made of iron . When [I]0-i wanted to help [her]157-jemima [she]157-jemima said , " No , thank [you]0-i ; [I]2308-i can manage them [myself]2308-i . [I]2308-i 've got a pair of bits that would break their jaws if [I]2308-i used them well , í and [she]157-jemima laughed and drove away . It 's so unwomanly .[2308-i]

" Tell [father]778-father [my]2308-i hire of the ground will not be out for six months , and before that [Em]157-jemima and [I]2308-i will be married . [My]2308-i pair of birds is breeding now , but [I]2308-i have n't been down to see them for three days . [I]2308-i do n't seem to care about anything any more . [I]2308-i do n't know what it is ; [I]2308-i 'm not well . If [I]2308-i go into [town]1501-town on Saturday [I]2308-i will let [the doctor]4524-the doctor examine [me]2308-i ; but perhaps [she]157-jemima 'll go in [herself]157-jemima . It 's a very strange thing , [Jemima]157-jemima , but [she]157-jemima never will send [her]157-jemima letters to post by [me]2308-i . If [I]2308-i ask [her]157-jemima [she]157-jemima has none , and the very next day [she]157-jemima goes in and posts them [herself]157-jemima . [You]157-jemima must n't say anything about it , [Jemima]157-jemima ,[2308-i]

but twice [I]0-i 've brought [her]2294-her letters from the post in [a gentleman]441-a gentleman 's hand , and [I]0-i 'm sure they were both from [the same person]2296-the same person , because [I]0-i noticed every little mark , even the dotting of the [i]0-i ' s. Of course it 's nothing to [me]0-i ; but for [Em]54-em 's sake [I]0-i ca n't help feeling an interest in [her]2294-her , however much [I]0-i may dislike [her]2294-her [myself]0-i ; and [I]0-i hope [she]2294-her 's up to nothing . [I]0-i pity [the man who marries [her]2294-her]2297-the man who marries her ; [I]0-i would n't be [him]2297-the man who marries her for anything . If [I]0-i had [a wife with pride]2298-a wife with pride [I]0-i 'd make [her]2298-a wife with pride give it up , sharp . [I]0-i do n't believe in [a man who ca n't make [a woman]540-a woman obey [him]2297-the man who marries her]2299-a man who ca n't make a woman obey him . Now [Em]2294-her , [I]0-i 'm very fond of [her]2294-her , as [you]2294-her know , but if [I]0-i tell [her]2294-her to put on a certain dress , that dress [she]2294-her puts on ; and if [I]0-i tell [her]2294-her to sit on a certain seat , on that seat [she]2294-her sits ; and if [I]0-i tell [her]2294-her not to speak to [a certain individual]2301-a certain individual , [she]2294-her does not speak to [them]2301-a certain individual . If [a man]242-a man lets [a woman]540-a woman do what [he]2297-the man who marries her does n't like [he]2297-the man who marries her 's [a muff]2304-a muff .

" Give [my]2308-i love to [mother]4231-mother and [the children]358-the children . The "[2308-i] veldí here is looking pretty good , and the sheep are better since [we]2305-we washed them . Tell [father]778-father the dip [he]778-father recommended is very good .

" [Em]54-em sends [her]54-em love to [you]2308-i . [She]54-em is making[2308-i]

[me]0-i some woollen shirts ; but they do n't fit [me]0-i so nicely as [those mother]2307-those mother made [me]0-i .

" Write soon to[156-gregory]

[[Your]2308-i loving brother]2309-your loving brother , [Gregory]156-gregory .

" P.S. [She]54-em drove past just now ; [I]54-em was sitting on the kraal wall right before [her]54-em eyes , and [she]54-em never even bowed .[54-em]

" G.N.R. "[156-gregory]

[CHAPTER VI]67-bonaparte . A BOER - WEDDING .

" [I]156-gregory DIDN'T know before [you]2310-his little betrothed were so fond of riding hard , "[156-gregory] said [Gregory]156-gregory to [[his]156-gregory little betrothed]2310-his little betrothed .

[They]2311-they were cantering slowly on [the road to [Oom Muller]108-oom muller 's]2312-the road to oom muller 's on the morning of the wedding . " Do [you]156-gregory call this riding hard ? "[156-gregory] asked [Em]54-em in some astonishment .

" Of course [I]54-em do ! It 's enough to break the horses ' necks , and knock one up for the whole day besides , "[54-em] [he]156-gregory added testily ; then twisted [his]156-gregory head to look at [the buggy that came on behind]2313-the buggy that came on behind . " [I]54-em thought [Waldo]60-waldo was such [a mad driver]4527-a mad driver ; [they]2311-they are taking it easily enough to - day , "[54-em] said

[Gregory]156-gregory . " [One]324-one would think the black stallions were lame . "[156-gregory]

" [I]59-lyndall suppose [they]2311-they want to keep out of [our]4529-our dust , "[59-lyndall] said [Em]54-em . " See , [they]2311-they stand still as soon as [we]4529-our do . "[59-lyndall] Perceiving this to be the case , [Gregory]156-gregory rode on . " It 's all that horse of [yours]54-em : [she]59-lyndall kicks up such a confounded dust , [I]60-waldo ca n't stand it [myself]60-waldo , "[60-waldo] [he]156-gregory said . Meanwhile [the cart]2314-the cart came on slowly enough . " Take the reins , "[60-waldo] said [Lyndall]59-lyndall , " and make [them]2311-they walk . [I]60-waldo want to rest and watch [their]2311-they hoofs to - day not to be exhilarated ; [I]60-waldo am so tired . "[60-waldo]

[She]59-lyndall leaned back in [her]59-lyndall corner , and [Waldo]60-waldo drove on slowly in the grey dawn light along [the level road]2315-the level road . [They]2316-they passed [the very milk - bush behind which so many years before [the old German]428-the old german had found [the Kaffir woman]901-the kaffir woman]2317-the very milk - bush behind which so many years before the old german had found the kaffir woman . But

[their]2316-they thoughts were not with [him]60-waldo that morning : they were the thoughts of [the young , that run out to meet the future]2320-the young , that run out to meet the future , and labour in the present . At last [he]60-waldo touched [her]59-lyndall arm .

" What is it ? "[59-lyndall] " [I]59-lyndall feared [you]59-lyndall had gone to sleep and might be jolted out , "[59-lyndall] [he]60-waldo said ; " [you]59-lyndall sat so quietly . "[59-lyndall] " No ; do not talk to [me]59-lyndall ; [I]59-lyndall am not asleep ; "[59-lyndall] but after a time [she]59-lyndall said suddenly : " [I]60-waldo hope [I]60-waldo shall never bring [a human being]4300-a human being into [the world]252-the world . "[60-waldo] [Waldo]60-waldo looked round ; [she]59-lyndall sat drawn into the corner , [her]59-lyndall blue cloud wound tightly about [her]59-lyndall , and [she]59-lyndall still watched the horses ' feet . Having no comment to offer on [her]59-lyndall somewhat unexpected remark , [he]60-waldo merely touched up [his]60-waldo horses .

" [I]60-waldo have no conscience , none , "[60-waldo] [she]59-lyndall added ; " but [I]56-god would not like to bring [a soul]4532-a soul into [this world]3439-this world . When it sinned and when it suffered something like a dead hand would fall on [me]56-god "[56-god] [You]60-waldo did it , [you]60-waldo , for [your]60-waldo own pleasure [you]60-waldo

created this thing ! See [your]60-waldo work!í If it lived to be eighty it would always hang like a mill - stone round [my]0-i neck , have the right to demand good from [me]0-i , and curse [me]0-i for [its]2321-its sorrow . [A parent]1125-a parent is only like to [God]56-god if [his]1125-a parent work turns out bad , so much the worse for [him]1125-a parent ; [he]1125-a parent dare not wash [his]1125-a parent hands of it . Time and years can never bring the day when [you]60-waldo can say to [[your]60-waldo child]2323-your child : " [Soul]168-soul , what have [I]2331-she to do with you?í "[2331-she]

[Waldo]60-waldo said dreamingly , " It is a marvellous thing that one soul should have power to cause another . "[2331-she] [She]2324-she heard the words as [she]2324-she heard the beating of the horses ' hoofs ; [her]2324-she thoughts ran on in [their]2325-they own line .

" [They]2325-they say , "[2331-she] [God]56-god sends the little babies.í Of all the dastardly revolting lies [men]3470-men tell to suit [themselves]3470-men , [I]0-i hate that most . [I]0-i suppose [[my]0-i father]3420-my father said so when [he]3420-my father knew [he]3420-my father was dying of

consumption , and [[my]0-i mother]3493-my mother when [she]3493-my mother knew [she]3493-my mother had nothing to support [me]0-i on , and [they]2325-they created [me]0-i to feed like a dog from stranger hands . [Men]3470-men do not say [God]56-god sends the books , or the newspaper articles , or the machines [they]3470-men make ; and then sigh , and shrug [their]3470-men shoulders and say [they]3470-men ca n't help it . Why do [they]3470-men say so about other things ? [Liars]3500-liars ! " [God]56-god sends [the little babies!í]4534-the little babies!í "[170-the devil] [She]2331-she struck [her]2331-she foot fretfully against the splashboard . " [The small children]4535-the small children say so earnestly . [They]4535-the small children touch [the little stranger]4536-the little stranger reverently who has just come from [[God]56-god 's far country]4537-god 's far country , and [they]4535-the small children peep about [the room]215-the room to see if not one white feather has dropped from the wing of the angel that brought [him]4536-the little stranger . On [their]4535-the small children lips the phrase means much ; on all others it is a deliberate lie . [Noticeable]169-noticeable , too , "[2339-all] [she]2331-she said , dropping in an instant from the passionate into a low , mocking tone , " when [people]249-people are married , though [they]2332-they should have [sixty children]4540-sixty children , [they]2332-they throw the[2340-her]

whole onus on [God]56-god . When [they]2332-they are not , [we]2333-we hear nothing about [God]56-god 's having sent [them]2332-they . When there has been no legal contract between [the parents]2334-the parents , who sends [the little children]479-the little children then ? [The Devil]170-the devil perhaps ! " [She]2340-her laughed [her]2340-her little silvery , mocking laugh . "[2340-her] Odd that [some men]1735-some men should come from [hell]4026-hell and some from [heaven]3422-heaven , and yet [all]2339-all look so much alike when [they]2339-all get here . "[2346-she]

[Waldo]60-waldo wondered at [her]2340-her . [He]60-waldo had not the key to [her]2340-her thoughts , and did not see the string on which they were strung . [She]2340-her drew [her]2340-her cloud tighter about [her]2340-her .

" It must be very nice to believe in [the Devil]3496-the devil , "[2346-she] [she]2340-her said ; " [I]2348-i wish [I]2348-i did . If it would be of any use [I]2348-i would pray three hours night and morning on [my]2348-i bare knees , "[2348-i] [God]56-god , let [me]0-i believe in [Satan.í]171-satan.í [He]2341-he is so useful to [those people who do]2342-those people who do . [They]2343-they may be as selfish and as sensual as [they]2343-they please , and , between [God]56-god 's will and [the Devil]170-the devil 's action ,

always have [some one]3445-some one to throw [their]2343-they sin on . But [we]2345-we , wretched unbelievers , [we]2345-we bear [our]2345-we own burdens : [we]2345-we must say , " [I]2348-i [myself]2348-i did it , [I]2348-i . Not [God]56-god , not [Satan]172-satan ; [I]2348-i myself!í That is the sting that strikes deep . [Waldo]60-waldo , "[2348-i] [she]2346-she said gently , with a sudden and complete change of manner , " [I]2310-his little betrothed like [you]60-waldo so much , [I]2310-his little betrothed love [you]60-waldo . "[2310-his little betrothed] [She]2346-she rested [her]2346-she cheek softly against [his]2347-his shoulder . " When [I]2310-his little betrothed am with [you]60-waldo [I]2310-his little betrothed never know that [I]2310-his little betrothed am [a woman]540-a woman and [you]60-waldo are [a man]242-a man ; [I]2310-his little betrothed only know that [we]4544-we are both things that think . [Other men]1813-other men when [I]2310-his little betrothed am with [them]1813-other men , whether [I]2310-his little betrothed love [them]1813-other men or not , [they]1813-other men are mere bodies to [me]2310-his little betrothed ; but [you]60-waldo are [a spirit]4546-a spirit ; [I]2310-his little betrothed like [you]60-waldo . Look , "[2310-his little betrothed] [she]2348-i said quickly , sinking back into [her]2348-i corner , " what a pretty pinkness there is on all [the hill - tops]4547-the hill - tops ! The sun will rise in a moment . "[2009-her lover]

[Waldo]60-waldo lifted [his]60-waldo eyes to look round over [the circle of golden hills]2349-the circle of golden hills ; and the horses , as the first sunbeams touched [them]2350-their , shook [their]2350-their heads

and champed [their]2350-their bright bits , till the brass settings in [their]2350-their harness glittered again .

It was eight o'clock when [they]2351-they neared [the farm - house]211-the farm - house : [a red - brick building , with kraals to the right and [a small orchard to the left]2354-a small orchard to the left]2353-a red - brick building , with kraals to the right and a small orchard to the left . Already there were signs of unusual life and bustle : [one cart]2355-one cart , a waggon , and a couple of saddles against the wall betokened the arrival of [a few early guests , whose numbers would soon be largely increased]2356-a few early guests , whose numbers would soon be largely increased . To a Dutch country wedding , [guests]2357-guests start up in numbers astonishing to [one who has merely ridden through [the plains of sparsely - inhabited [karroo]42-karroo]2359-the plains of sparsely - inhabited karroo]2358-one who has merely ridden through the plains of sparsely - inhabited karroo .

As the morning advances , [riders]2360-riders on many shades of steeds appear from all directions , and add [their]2360-riders saddles to the long rows against the walls , shake hands , drink coffee , and stand about outside in groups to watch [the arriving carts]2361-the arriving carts and ox - waggons , as [they]2360-riders are unburdened of [their]2360-riders heavy freight of [massive Tantes and

comely daughters]2362-massive tantes and comely daughters , followed by swarms of [children of all sizes]2363-children of all sizes , dressed in all manner of print and mole - skin , who are taken care of by [Hottentot]98-the hottentot , [Kaffir]110-kaffir , and half - caste [nurses , whose many - shaded complexions , ranging from light yellow up to ebony black]2364-nurses , whose many - shaded complexions , ranging from light yellow up to ebony black , add variety to the animated scene . Everywhere is excitement and bustle , which gradually increases as the time for the return of the wedding - party approaches . Preparations for the feast are actively advancing in [the kitchen]798-the kitchen ; coffee is liberally handed round , and amid a profound sensation , and the firing of guns , the horse - waggon draws up , and the wedding - party alight . [Bride]173-bride and [bridegroom]2366-bridegroom with [[their]2367-their attendants]2368-their attendants march solemnly to [the marriage - chamber]2369-the marriage - chamber , where bed and box are decked out in white , with ends of ribbon and artificial flowers , and where on a row of chairs [the party]2370-the party solemnly seat [themselves]2370-the party . After a time [bridesmaid and best man]2371-bridesmaid and best man rise , and conduct in with ceremony [each individual guest]2372-each individual guest ,

to wish success , and to kiss [bride and bridegroom]2373-bride and bridegroom . Then the feast is set on the table , and it is almost sunset before the dishes are cleared away , and the pleasure of the day begins . Everything is removed from [the great front room]269-the great front room , and the mud floor , well rubbed with bullock 's blood , glistens like polished mahogany . [The female portion of the assembly]2375-the female portion of the assembly flock into [the side - rooms]2376-the side - rooms to attire [themselves]2375-the female portion of the assembly for the evening ; and re - issue clad in white muslin , and gay with bright ribbons and brass jewelry . The dancing begins as the first tallow candles are stuck up about the walls , the music coming from [a couple of fiddlers in a corner of [the room]215-the room]2377-a couple of fiddlers in a corner of the room . [Bride]173-bride and [bridegroom]2366-bridegroom open the ball , and the floor is soon covered with [whirling couples]2380-whirling couples , and [every one]3534-every one 's spirits rise . [Bride]173-bride and [bridegroom]2366-bridegroom mingle freely in the throng , and here and there [a musical man]2383-a musical man sings vigorously as [he]2383-a musical man drags [[his]2383-a musical man partner]2384-his partner through the Blue Water or John Speriwig ; [boys]2385-boys shout and

applaud , and the enjoyment and confusion are intense , till eleven o'clock comes . By this time [the children who swarm in the side - rooms]2386-the children who swarm in the side - rooms are not to be kept quiet longer , even by hunches of bread and cake ; there is a general howl and wail , that rises yet higher than the scraping of fiddles , and [mothers]2387-mothers rush from [[their]2387-mothers partners]2388-their partners to knock small heads together , and cuff [little nursemaids]2389-little nursemaids , and force [the wailers]2390-the wailers down into unoccupied corners of beds , under tables and behind boxes . In half an hour every variety of childish snore is heard on all sides , and it has become perilous to raise or set down a foot in any of [the side - rooms]2376-the side - rooms lest a small head or hand should be crushed . Now too the busy feet have broken the solid coating of the floor , and a cloud of fine dust arises , that makes a yellow halo round the candles , and sets [asthmatic people]2392-asthmatic people coughing , and grows denser , till to recognise [any one on the opposite side of the room]2393-any one on the opposite side of the room becomes impossible ,

and [a partner]2394-a partner 's face is seen through a yellow mist .

At twelve o'clock [the bride]2395-the bride is led to [the marriage - chamber]2369-the marriage - chamber and undressed ; the lights are blown out , and [the bridegroom]2397-the bridegroom is brought to the door by [the best man]2398-the best man , who gives [him]2397-the bridegroom the key ; then the door is shut and locked , and the revels rise higher than ever . There is no thought of sleep till morning , and [no unoccupied spot where sleep may be found]2399-no unoccupied spot where sleep may be found . It was at this stage of the proceedings on the night of [Tant]53-tant ' sannie ' [Sannie]53-tant ' sannie 's wedding that [Lyndall]59-lyndall sat near the doorway in one of [the side - rooms]2376-the side - rooms , to watch [the dancers]2401-the dancers as [they]2401-the dancers appeared and disappeared in the yellow cloud of dust . [Gregory]156-gregory sat moodily in a corner of [the large dancing - room]2402-the large dancing - room . [[His]156-gregory little betrothed]2310-his little betrothed touched [his]156-gregory arm . " [I]2009-her lover wish [you]156-gregory would go and ask [Lyndall]59-lyndall to dance with [you]156-gregory , "[2009-her lover] [she]2310-his little betrothed said ; " [she]59-lyndall must be so tired ; [she]59-lyndall has sat still the whole evening . "[2310-his little betrothed]

" [I]156-gregory have asked [her]59-lyndall three times , "[156-gregory] replied [[her]2310-his little betrothed lover]2009-her lover shortly . " [I]156-gregory 'm not going to be [her]59-lyndall dog , and creep to [her]59-lyndall feet , just to give [her]59-lyndall the pleasure of kicking [me]156-gregory not for [you]156-gregory , [Em]54-em , nor for [anybody else]4548-anybody else . "[156-gregory]

" Oh , [I]156-gregory did n't know [you]156-gregory had asked [her]59-lyndall , [Greg]156-gregory , "[156-gregory] said [[his]2009-her lover little betrothed]2310-his little betrothed , humbly ; and [she]2310-his little betrothed went away to pour out coffee . Nevertheless , some time after [Gregory]156-gregory found [he]156-gregory had shifted so far round [the room]215-the room as to be close to the door where [Lyndall]59-lyndall sat . After standing for some time [he]156-gregory inquired whether [he]156-gregory might not bring [her]59-lyndall a cup of coffee . [She]59-lyndall declined ; but still [he]156-gregory stood on why should [he]156-gregory not stand there as well as anywhere else ? , and then [he]156-gregory stepped into [the bed - room]2407-the bed - room . " May [I]156-gregory not bring [you]59-lyndall a stove , [Miss Lyndall]59-lyndall , to put [your]59-lyndall feet on ? "[156-gregory] " Thank [you]59-lyndall . "[156-gregory] [He]156-gregory sought for one , and put it under [her]59-lyndall feet .

" There is a draught from that broken window : shall [I]54-em stuff something in the pane ? "[54-em] " No , [we]4549-we want air . "[54-em] [Gregory]156-gregory looked round , but nothing else suggesting itself , [he]156-gregory sat down on a box on the opposite side of the door . [Lyndall]59-lyndall sat before [him]156-gregory , [her]59-lyndall chin resting in [her]59-lyndall hand ; [her]59-lyndall eyes , steel - grey by day but black by night , looked through the doorway into [the next room]221-the next room . After a time [he]156-gregory thought [she]59-lyndall had entirely forgotten [his]156-gregory proximity , and [he]156-gregory dared to inspect the little hands and neck as [he]156-gregory never dared when [he]156-gregory was in momentary dread of the eyes being turned upon [him]156-gregory .

[She]59-lyndall was dressed in black , which seemed to take [her]59-lyndall yet further from [the white - clad , gew - gawed women about [her]59-lyndall]2409-the white - clad , gew - gawed women about her ; and the little hands were white , and the diamond ring glittered . Where had [she]59-lyndall got that ring ? [He]156-gregory bent forward a little and tried to decipher the letters , but the candle - light was too faint . When [he]156-gregory looked up [her]59-lyndall

eyes were fixed on [him]156-gregory . [She]59-lyndall was looking at [him]156-gregory not , [Gregory]156-gregory felt , as [she]59-lyndall had ever looked at [him]156-gregory before ; not as though [he]156-gregory were a stump or a stone that chance had thrown in [her]59-lyndall way . To - night , whether it were critically , or kindly , or unkindly , [he]156-gregory could not tell , but [she]59-lyndall looked at [him]156-gregory , at [the man]372-the man , [Gregory]156-gregory Rose , with attention . A vague elation filled [him]156-gregory . [He]156-gregory clinched [his]156-gregory fist tight to think of some good idea [he]156-gregory might express to [her]59-lyndall ; but of all those profound things [he]156-gregory had pictured [himself]156-gregory as saying to [her]59-lyndall , when [he]156-gregory sat alone in [the daub - and - wattle house]2411-the daub - and - wattle house , not one came . [He]156-gregory said , at last ,

" These Boer dances are very low things ; "[156-gregory] and then , as soon as it had gone from [him]156-gregory , [he]156-gregory thought it was not a clever remark , and wished it back . Before [Lyndall]59-lyndall replied [Em]54-em looked in at the door . " Oh , come , "[156-gregory] [she]54-em said ; " [they]4550-they are going to have the cushion - dance . [She]54-em stretched out [her]54-em little hand to feel for [his]60-waldo .

" It is so nice to lie here and hear that noise , "[2432-a nihilist] [she]54-em said . " [I]2435-you like to feel that strange life beating up against [me]2435-you . "[2435-you]

[She]2432-a nihilist sighed , and drew a long breath . " Have [you]2435-you made any plans ? "[0-i] [she]2432-a nihilist asked [him]2435-you presently .

" Yes , "[2435-you] [he]2435-you said , the words coming in jets , with pauses between ; " [I]2432-a nihilist will take the grey mare ,[2432-a nihilist]

[I]0-i will travel first [I]0-i will see [the world]252-the world then [I]0-i will find work . "[2432-a nihilist]

" What work ? "[2432-a nihilist] " [I]0-i do not know . "[0-i] [She]2432-a nihilist made a little impatient movement .

" That is no plan . If [you]2435-you go into [the world]252-the world aimless , without a definite object , dreaming , dreaming , [you]2435-you will be definitely defeated , bamboozled , knocked this way and that ; in the end [you]2435-you will stand with [your]2435-you beautiful life all spent , and nothing to show . [They]4564-they talk of genius it is nothing but this , that [a man]242-a man knows what [he]242-a man can do best , and does it , and nothing else . [Waldo]60-waldo , "[2435-you] [she]2432-a nihilist said , knitting [her]2432-a nihilist little fingers closer among [his]2435-you , " [I]0-i wish [I]0-i could help [you]2435-you ; [I]0-i wish [I]0-i could rouse [you]2435-you up , and make [you]2435-you see tht now to - day [you]2435-you must decide what [you]2435-you will be and do . live for that one thing . The secret of success is concentration ; wherever there has been a great life , or a great work , that has gone before . Taste everything a little , look at everything ; but live for one thing . Anything is possible to [a man who knows [his]2437-a man who knows his end and moves straight for it , and for it alone end and moves straight for it , and for it alone]2437-a man who knows his end and moves straight for it , and for it alone . " Suppose [a woman]540-a woman , young , friendless as [I]214-the boer - woman am , [the weakest thing on [[God]56-god 's earth]1435-god 's earth]4572-the weakest thing on god 's earth . But [she]540-a woman must make [her]540-a woman way through life . What [she]540-a woman would be [she]540-a woman can not be because [she]540-a woman is [a woman]540-a woman ; so [she]540-a woman looks carefully at [herself]540-a woman and [the world]252-the world about [her]540-a woman , to see where [her]540-a woman path must lie . There is [no one]237-no one to help [her]2438-she ; [she]2438-she must help [herself]2438-she . [She]2438-she looks . These things [she]2438-she has a sweet voice , rich in subtile intonations ; a fair , very fair face , with a power of concentrating in itself , and giving expression to , feelings that otherwise[214-the boer - woman]

must have been dissipated in words ; a rare power of entering into other lives unlike [her]2438-she own , and intuitively reading them aright . These qualities [she]2438-she has . How shall [she]2438-she use them ? [A poet]2439-a poet , [a writer]2440-a writer , needs only the mental ; what use has [he]2440-a writer for a beautiful body that registers clearly mental emotions ? And [the painter]2441-the painter wants an eye for form and colour , and [the musician]2442-the musician an ear for time and tune , and [the mere drudge]2443-the mere drudge has no need for mental gifts . But there is one art in which all [she]2438-she has would be used , for which they are all necessary the delicate expressive body , the rich voice , the power of mental transposition . [The actor]2444-the actor , who absorbs and then reflects from [himself]2444-the actor other human lives , needs them all , but needs not much more . This is [her]2438-she end ; but how to reach it ? Before [her]2438-she are endless difficulties : seas must be crossed , poverty must be endured , loneliness , want . [She]2438-she must be content to wait long before

[she]2438-she can even get [her]2438-she feet upon the path . If [she]2438-she has made blunders in the past , if [she]2438-she has weighted [herself]2438-she with a burden which [she]2438-she must bear to the end , [she]2438-she must but bear the burden bravely , and labour on . There is no use in wailing and repentance here : [the next world]2445-the next world is the place for that ; this life is too short . By [our]2446-our errors [we]2446-our see deeper into life . [They]2447-they help [us]2446-our .

" If [she]2438-she does all this if [she]2438-she waits patiently , if [she]2438-she is never cast down , never despairs , never forgets [her]2438-she end , moves straight toward it , bending [men]3470-men and things most unlikely to [her]2438-she purpose , [she]2438-she must succeed at last . [Men]3470-men and things are plastic ; they part to the right and left when one comes among [them]4579-them moving in a straight line to one end . [I]60-waldo know it by [my]60-waldo own little experience , "[60-waldo] [she]2438-she said . " Long years ago [I]60-waldo resolved to be sent to [school]3436-school . It seemed a thing utterly out of [my]60-waldo power ; but [I]60-waldo waited , [I]60-waldo watched , [I]60-waldo collected clothes , [I]60-waldo took [my]60-waldo place at [the school]1944-the school ;[60-waldo]

when all was ready [I]0-i bore with [my]0-i full force on [the Boer - woman]214-the boer - woman , and [she]214-the boer - woman sent [me]0-i at last . It was a small thing ; but life is made up of small things , as a body is built up of cells . What has been done in small things can be done in large . Shall be , " [she]693-the woman said softly .[693-the woman]

[Waldo]60-waldo listened . To [him]60-waldo the words were no confession , no glimpse into the strong , proud , restless heart of [the woman]693-the woman . They were general words with a general application . [He]60-waldo looked up into the sparkling sky with dull eyes . " Yes , "[2460-we] [he]60-waldo said ; " but when [we]4582-we lie and think , and think , [we]4582-we see that there is nothing worth doing . [The universe]1629-the universe is so large , and [man]329-man is so small "[60-waldo] [She]693-the woman shook [her]693-the woman head quickly .

" But [we]4582-we must not think so far ; it is madness , it is a disease . [We]4582-we know that [no man]339-no man 's work is great , and stands for ever . [Moses]92-moses is dead , and [the prophets]1444-the prophets , and the books that [[our]4582-we[60-waldo]

grandmothers]4587-our grandmothers fed on the mould is eating . [[Your]2450-your poet]2451-your poet and [painter]2452-painter and [actor]2453-actor , before the shouts that applaud [them]2454-them have died [their]2454-them names grow strange , they are mile - stones that [the world]252-the world has passed . [Men]3470-men have set [their]3470-men mark on [mankind]2457-mankind forever , as [they]3470-men thought ; but time has washed it out as it has washed out [mountains]1718-mountains and [continents]2459-continents . And what if [we]2460-we could help [mankind]2457-mankind , and leave the traces of [our]2460-we work upon it to the end ? Mankind is only an ephemeral blossom on the tree of time ; there were [others before it opened]2461-others before it opened ; there will be [others]4156-others after it has fallen . Where was [man]329-man in the time of the dicynodont , and when [hoary monsters]2464-hoary monsters wallowed in the mud ? Will [he]329-man be found in the ? ons that are to come ? [We]2460-we are sparks , [we]2460-we are shadows , [we]2460-we are pollen , which the next wind will carry away . [We]2460-we are dying already ; it is all a dream .

" [I]60-waldo know that thought . When the fever of living is on [us]2460-we , when the desire to become , to[60-waldo]

know , to do , is driving [us]2460-we mad , [we]2460-we can use it as an anodyne , to still the fever and cool [our]2460-we beating pulses . But it is a poison , not a food . If [we]2460-we live on it it will turn [our]2460-we blood to ice ; [we]2460-we might as well be dead . [We]2460-we must not , [Waldo]60-waldo ; [I]0-i want [your]60-waldo life to be beautiful , to end in something . [You]60-waldo are nobler and stronger than [I]0-i , " [she]2467-she said ; "[2467-she] and as much better as one of [[God]56-god 's great angels]2465-god 's great angels is better than [a sinning man]2466-a sinning man .
